17.name: Private Vietnam 17 Days 16 Nights - Vietnam Explorer & Relaxation (Detailed)

days.title: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Tan Son Nhat International Airport in Ho Chi Minh City. Look for the guide or driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Ho Chi Minh City. The rest of the day is free for relaxation or independent exploration. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8 am, meet your driver and guide for a city tour of Ho Chi Minh City. Visit the Independence Palace (Reunification Palace). Explore French colonial sites including Notre Dame Cathedral and the Central Post Office. Visit the War Remnants Museum. Around 12 pm, enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. In the afternoon, depart for the Cu Chi Tunnels (approximately 1.5-hour drive). Watch an introductory video about the tunnels. Explore the tunnel systems, including living areas and wartime facilities. See hidden traps and learn about the tunnel's security measures. Taste local tea and cassava (wartime guerrilla food). Option to try shooting guns. Return to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City after the Cu Chi Tunnels tour. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh – Mui Ne by Private Car
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. At 8:30 AM, your driver will pick you up from your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City for a scenic 5-hour drive to Mui Ne. Check in to your accommodation upon arrival in Mui Ne. Spend the remainder of the day relaxing at your leisure, perhaps on the beach or at your hotel. Overnight in Mui Ne.

days.title: Mui Ne Adventure – Sand Dunes & Cultural
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free morning to relax. At 12:45 PM, begin your afternoon tour. Visit the Fairy Stream, spending about an hour walking and taking photos. Explore the nearby fishing village to experience local life. Head to the White Sand Dunes for approximately an hour to enjoy the scenery (optional ATV ride available for an extra cost). On the way to the Red Sand Dunes, stop for photos along the beach road. Watch the sunset at the Red Sand Dunes. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Mui Ne.

days.title: Mui Ne – Da Lat by Private Car
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 9:00 AM, your driver will pick you up for a 4-hour private car transfer to Da Lat. Check in to your accommodation in Da Lat. Enjoy the rest of the day relaxing or independently exploring the sights of Da Lat. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat Exploring Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 am, you will be picked up from your hotel. Take a cable car ride at Robin Hill for panoramic views of Da Lat and Paradise Lake. Visit Truc Lam Zen Monastery, one of Vietnam's largest Zen universities, known for its serene scenery and flower gardens by Tuyen Lam Lake. Explore the Clay Tunnel, featuring clay sculptures of historical and cultural landmarks of Da Lat. Visit Datanla Waterfall, with an option for a roller coaster ride or a walk to the bottom. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Explore the French Quarter, seeing original French colonial-style villas built in the 1920s and 30s. Visit a Weasel Coffee Farm to learn about the unique coffee-making process. Visit Linh Phuoc Pagoda (Broken Glass Pagoda), known for its intricate dragon design made from broken glass and impressive Buddhist statues. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat – Fly to Da Nang – Hoi An
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. After breakfast, your driver will transfer you to Lien Khuong Airport for your flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival at Da Nang Airport, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your accommodation in Hoi An Ancient Town. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Hoi An at your own pace. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour – Tra Que Village Cooking Class – Basket Boat Ride
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, begin your exploration of Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site, visiting the historic Tan Ky Old House, the Fukien Assembly Hall, the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge, and strolling through the vibrant Hoi An Market. At 11:00 AM, escape to the peaceful Tra Que Organic Village just outside Hoi An. Walk through the vegetable gardens, learn about traditional farming techniques, and participate in a hands-on cooking class to prepare local dishes. Enjoy the delicious lunch you've cooked. After lunch, travel to the serene Cam Thanh region for a peaceful bamboo basket boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Enjoy fresh coconut juice before returning to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Ba Na Hills
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, begin your trip to Ba Na Hills. Experience four seasons in one day and enjoy festivals, activities, and diverse cuisine. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car, enjoying panoramic mountain views. Visit the famous Golden Bridge, supported by giant stone hands, offering stunning scenery. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour with its themed gardens and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy the attractions at Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park. Have a buffet lunch at a restaurant in Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village, a replica of classical French architecture. Return to your hotel with memories of the mountain adventure and spectacular sights. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to relax at your hotel, unwind on An Bang Beach, or explore the charm of Hoi An at your own leisure. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. After breakfast, your driver will transfer you to Da Nang Airport for your flight to Hanoi. Upon arrival at Noi Bai Airport in Hanoi, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel for check-in. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Hanoi at your own pace. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi City Tour Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, your tour guide will pick you up for a full-day exploration of Hanoi. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (dress modestly), including the Mausoleum (closed Mondays, Fridays, and mid-June to mid-August), Presidential Palace, and Stilt House. See the unique One Pillar Pagoda in its tranquil garden setting. Explore the Temple of Literature, known for its architecture and historical importance. Enjoy a local lunch at a nearby restaurant. In the afternoon, if the Ethnology Museum is closed (Mondays or other reasons), visit the Women's Museum. Experience the lively Hanoi Train Street and the Old Quarter, including the serene Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Return to your hotel around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Ninh Binh Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, you will be picked up for a trip to Ninh Binh. Visit Bai Dinh Pagoda, Vietnam's largest Buddhist complex with impressive statues and architecture. Have lunch at a restaurant. Explore the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex with a captivating boat ride through limestone karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave), climb nearly 500 steps to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Cat Ba Island – Cat Ba National Park
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Between 7:00 and 7:45 AM, a bus will pick you up from your hotel in the Old Quarter for a transfer to Hai Phong via Highway 5B, offering views of paddy fields and villages. At 10:15 AM, arrive at Got Harbour Station and take a speedboat to Cai Vieng. Another bus will transfer you to the center of Cat Ba Town. At 11:15 AM, check in to your hotel and have a traditional lunch. At 2:00 PM, your tour guide will pick you up for trekking in Cat Ba National Park, including a trek through Kim Giao forest to Ngu Lam Peak for panoramic island views. At 5:00 PM, return to your hotel. At 6:00 PM, enjoy dinner and stay overnight in Cat Ba Town, with free time to explore the local daily life. Overnight in Cat Ba.

days.title: Cat Ba – Lan Ha Bay
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel at 6:45 AM. Between 10:15 and 10:30 AM, you will be picked up from your hotel for a scenic drive to Beo Harbour. At 11:00 AM, you will be welcomed aboard SERENITY CRUISES with a welcome drink and cruise information. The cruise will slowly navigate past the ancient Cai Beo fishing village. At 11:30 AM, savor a delicious lunch (buffet for groups of 40+). At 1:00 PM, the cruise will sail to Viet Hai Port. Disembark and travel by electric car/bicycle to the ancient Viet Hai Village, where you can experience a fish-foot massage, explore traditional houses, and interact with locals. At 2:30 PM, enjoy kayaking and swimming in the bay (life jackets recommended). At 3:40 PM, the boat will begin its return journey to Beo Pier, allowing time for relaxation on the top deck. At 4:15 PM, a small sunset party with fresh fruit, biscuits, and tea will be served. At 4:45 PM, return to Beo Dock and take the bus back to your hotel for dinner and overnight stay. Overnight in Cat Ba.

days.title: Cat Ba Island – Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:30 AM, enjoy free time to explore Cat Ba Town independently, perhaps walking on the beach or visiting the local market. At 11:00 AM, check out of your hotel and have lunch at a local restaurant or the hotel. At 12:15 PM, a bus will pick you up from your hotel for the journey back to Hanoi. At 4:30 PM, the bus will drop you off at your hotel in Hanoi, concluding the tour. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi Departure
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Your driver will pick you up from the hotel and transfer you to Noi Bai Airport for your departure flight. Safe travels!

16-hidden.name: Private Vietnam 16 Days 15 Nights - Hidden Gems of Vietnam (Detailed)

days.title: Ha Noi Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Noi Bai International Airport, Ha Noi. Look for guide/driver with your name sign. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Ha Noi. Free time to relax or start exploring Ha Noi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi City Full Day
days.details: 8:00 AM: Tour guide picks you up from your hotel. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, Stilt House - modest dress required). Note: Mausoleum closed Mondays, Fridays, and June 15th - August 15th (photos and surrounding area still accessible). See the unique One Pillar Pagoda in tranquil gardens. Explore the Temple of Literature (well-preserved architecture, historical significance). Enjoy a local lunch at a nearby restaurant. Afternoon options: If not Monday or Ethnology Museum closed: Visit the Ethnology Museum. Otherwise: Visit the Women's Museum (exhibits on Vietnamese women's life and history). Experience the bustling Hanoi Train Street. Explore the Old Quarter and visit Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Around 5:00 PM: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Pu Luong
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 07:30 AM: Pick up by guide and driver from hotel for Pu Luong. Approximately 4.5-hour drive to Pu Luong with a short break. Arrive in Pu Luong at noon and have lunch. Check in to your reserved room. Free time to wander and enjoy the atmosphere. Afternoon: 3-hour (6 km) trek inside Pu Luong Nature Reserve (easy trails). Visit remote rural villages of Black Thai minorities to see local lifestyle. Explore Kho Muong local Cave (largest natural unspoiled cave in Pu Luong). Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant. Overnight in Pu Luong.

days.title: Pu Luong - Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast and enjoy the view. Board the car to the trekking point for a medium or easy trek. Trek along small roads and trails through rice fields. Experience bamboo rafting on the river. See local giant water wheels. Return to the lodge for lunch and free time. Depart back to Ha Noi in the afternoon. Arrive in Ha Noi in the late afternoon. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Hoa Lu – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick up by guide and driver for Ninh Binh. Visit Hoa Lu, the ancient capital. Explore the Dinh Temple (Emperor Dinh Tien Hoang). Explore the Le Temple (Emperor Le Dai Hanh). Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex. Enjoy a mesmerizing boat ride through Trang An's karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave). Climb almost 500 steps to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Ha Noi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: 08:00 – 08:30: Pick up at hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15: Check in aboard cruise with welcome drink and safety briefing as the boat cruises to Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15: Enjoy lunch in the restaurant. 15:30: Explore Thien Canh Son cave (bring camera, wear sport shoes for hiking). 17:30: Enjoy sunset on the bay and "Happy Hour". 18:00: Cooking class on sundeck (Deep Fried Spring rolls). 19:30: Dinner served on sundeck or restaurant. 21:00: Relax on boat or join Squid fishing (Reception deck area). Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi - Fly to Da Nang - Hoi An by Private Car
days.details: 06:30: Start the day with Taichi on the sundeck. 07:00: Light breakfast served in the dining room. 07:45: Visit Vung Vieng floating fishing village (optional: bamboo boat or kayaking). 09:00: Return to the main boat for relaxing and check out (place luggage outside cabin door). 09:45: Brunch served in the restaurant while the boat returns to the harbor. 11:00: Disembark at the harbor. Transfer to Ha Noi city (shuttle bus to AEON Mall Long Bien, driver pick-up from Noi Bai Airport). Take a 1-hour flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival in Da Nang, meet your guide and driver. Private car transfer to your hotel in Hoi An for check-in. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Walking Tour - Basket Boat - Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Start exploring Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site). Visit Tan Ky Old House (architecture and cultural fusion). Discover Fukien Assembly Hall (intricate architecture, cultural significance). See the Japanese Covered Bridge (iconic symbol). Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market (colorful goods). Have lunch at a local restaurant. 2:00 PM: Hotel pick-up for Cam Thanh region. Enjoy a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest (lush mangroves). Return to your hotel, rest of the day at leisure. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Nha Trang Rafting Tour
days.details: 9:00: Pick up at your hotel (Nha Trang) and depart to the start point for rafting. The start point is about 40 km from Nha Trang city, namely Khanh Vinh district, where resided by most ethnic minority people (the Ragley). It takes approximately 1 hour to get to the start point. 10:30: start rafting downstream to the lunch point. Visit the local orchard along the way (optional). The river along this area is protected by the local people as they use the river water for cooking and daily activities. Guests can wallow in cool water with views of mountains, trees and birds. (Takes about 1 hour to get to the point lunch). Before lunch, (depend on the timing & season) we have the opportunity to enjoy a variety of fruits such as grapefruit, oranges, rambutan, durian, mango plum, jackfruit, dragon fruit ... (seasonal). Lunch lasts about 1.5 to 2 hours. 14:00: Continue to raft downstream to the end point. This is the calm part of the river, where guests can participate in some activities. (Activities on the river is a very good opportunity for teambuilding); applied when number of guests is from 6 on up and requested by the team leader). 15.00: Pick up guests and return to your hotel in the City. 16.00 Arrive at the hotel. days.title: Nha Trang Discovery with the Emperor Cruise
days.details: 07h45 – 08h15: Pick up from your hotel and transfer to Nha Trang Port to board the Emperor Cruises. 08h30 – 09h45: Arrival at the port where you will be greeted by the Experiences Manager with a welcome drink. It's time to go back the boat. You will be served a sumptuous set lunch on board with local beers, soft drink, fine wine, or premium spirits as the boat anchors near Hon Tre Island with its tranquil lagoon. Af the lunch, guesst and relax and go finish ing on boat. 13h30 – 14h00: Take a rest and fishing. 14h00 – 14h30: Visiting Fish farm for exploring the beautiful landscape by basket boat surrounding the finish villlage. 14h30 – 15h00: Cruise back to Nha Trang Harbor passing Vung Ngan floating village and Vinpearl Island, before catching a glimpse of the Bao Dai Villas as we return to the mainland. 15h00: At the port your Emperor Cruises Van will be waiting to take you back to your hotel. All customers will get the last confirmation of pick up time one day before the cruising date. Have lunch in the park. Tour ends. Car & guide will transfer you back to the hotel. Overnight in Nha Trang.

Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Cai Be - Floating Market – Cu Lao- An Binh - Vinh Long

Visitors will be introduced to how to raise bees for honey and enjoy honey tea. The boat goes upstream across the windy Tien River. On the way back, visitors can admire My Thuan Suspension Bridge across the Tien River. Transfer back to a hotel in Ho Chi Minh. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Have Breakfast at your hotel. At 8 am: Our driver and guide will meet you at your hotel in HCM city center and start the morning trip to visit Independence Palace (also called the Reunification palace). This palace was built on the sight of the former Norodom palace. It was designed by the architect Ngo Viet Thu and is a widely known landmark of Ho Chi Minh City. After the Independence Palace, our car will take you to visit the beautiful structures from the French Colonial times such as Notre Dame Cathedral, the historic Central Post Office. Followed by the remarkable site of the War Remnants Museum which has a vast display of the both the Indochina wars. At about 12 pm: Enjoy local food at a local restaurant. After lunch, we will depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (The trip takes approximately 1,5 hours car driving). Upon arrival, before exploring the tunnels, you will see a short introductory video about the tunnels. By watching this video, you can learn how the tunnels were constructed and how the people survived in the harsh conditions of the war time. Then, with the guide, you will explore the remaining area and tunnel systems. This system includes the special constructed living areas with kitchens, bedrooms side by side with other martial facilities like storage, weapons factories, field hospitals, and command centers helping whoever lives inside the tunnels meet their basic needs. Besides, you will also see many hidden trap doors and dangerous traps within the maze-like tunnels for security purpose during the war. Afterward, you will have a chance to taste a special tea and cassava (these are guerilla's food during the war). Take a relax or you can try the real shooting gun. After Cu Chi tunnels, transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

The journey through these villages not only showcases the stunning natural beauty of Sapa but also provides insight into the rich tapestry of its cultural landscape. See the picturesque Cat Cat Waterfall and a historic French-built hydroelectric power station. Enjoy the charm of the mountain village and take photos. 18h00 – 18h30: Have dinner at the restaurant. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa

days.title: Sapa - Lao Chai - Ta Van
days.details: 07h30: Have breakfast at the restaurant. 08h30: Begin a trekking adventure with your guide to Y Linh Ho Village. Hike through stunning rice terraces along the Muong Hoa Stream towards Lao Chai village (Black H'mong ethnic minority). Enjoy breathtaking views of the Hoang Lien Son mountain range. Continue trekking through traditional hill tribe villages: Lao Chai (Black H'mong), and Ta Van (Black H'mong, Dzao, Dzay). Experience the unique cultures and daily life of these communities. 11h30 – 12h00: Have lunch and rest at Ta Van village. 13h30 – 14h00: Return to your hotel in Sapa Town. 18h00: Have dinner at a restaurant. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa

days.title: Sa Pa - Fansipan Peak - Ha Noi by Bus
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. Transfer to Fansipan, the highest peak in Indochina. Enjoy panoramic views of Sapa, Muong Hoa Valley, Hoang Lien National Forest, and Lai Chau Province during the cable car ride. Take in the stunning scenery from the "Roof of Indochina." Transfer back to Sapa. Have lunch at a restaurant. 14:30: Pick-up from your hotel by van for the transfer back to Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Ha Noi - Hoa Lu - Tam Coc - Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 08:00 AM: Pick-up from your Hanoi hotel for a journey to Ninh Binh province with cultural insights from your guide. Explore Hoa Lu, the ancient capital, and remnants of the 10th-century citadel, learning about the Dinh, Le, and Ly dynasties. Enjoy a delicious buffet lunch featuring local specialties (goat meat, fish, chicken) with vegetarian options available. Experience a 1.5-hour bamboo boat ride through Tam Coc, admiring limestone karsts and emerald rice paddies ("Halong Bay on land"). Enjoy a 45-minute bicycle ride through local villages, observing rural life and connecting with locals. Visit Mua Cave and climb 500 steps to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Return to Hanoi in the late afternoon/early evening with lasting memories. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. 08:00 – 08:30: Pick-up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter by shuttle bus. 12:15: Check-in aboard with a welcome drink and safety briefing as the boat cruises to Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15: Enjoy a delicious lunch in the restaurant. 15:30: Explore Thien Canh Son cave (bring camera and wear sports shoes for hiking). 17:30: Enjoy the sunset on the bay and join "Happy Hour." 18:00: Participate in a cooking class on the sundeck, learning to make Deep-Fried Spring rolls. 19:30: Dinner will be served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 21:00: Relax on the boat or join Squid fishing on the Reception deck. Overnight in Ha Long Bay

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi - Fly to Danang - Hoi An

Upon arrival at Da Nang International Airport, collect your luggage and meet your driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in Hoi An city center. The remainder of the day is free to relax or explore Hoi An's nightlife. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An - Basket Boat Ride - Hoi An Walking Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Approximately 1:00 PM: Pick-up from your hotel (Da Nang area) by van and tour guide. Experience Cam Thanh Coconut Village: Learn traditional fishing techniques. Row unique Vietnamese bamboo basket boats through coconut palm waterways. Gain insight into the local way of life. Participate in fun and safe hands-on activities. Approximately 2:30 PM: Visit Hoi An Old Town. Explore the Phuc Kien Chinese Assembly Hall. See well-preserved old houses like Phung Hung Ancient House or Tan Ky Ancient House. Visit the Museum of Folk Culture in Hoi An. Enjoy art shows at Hoi An Traditional Performing Arts House. Visit the Japanese Bridge. Explore handicraft shops and artwork galleries. Discover smaller laneways and local neighborhoods. Enjoy dinner with Hoi An specialty food. 6:00 PM: Enjoy a boat ride on the Hoai River and release flower lanterns. Explore the lantern street and enjoy free time at the night market. 6:30-7:00 PM: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 07:30 AM: Pick-up from your hotel lobby by minivan and tour guide for a ride to Ba Na Hills via Cable Car. Experience a ride on the most modern Cable Car in Southeast Asia. Visit Dream Stream Cable car Station and admire the view of Da Nang coastal city. After the first cable car, visit The Golden Bridge, Le Jardin D'amourn (9 gardens), and Linh Ung pagoda. Take the second Cable Car to the French Village. Enjoy Street Music, Art statues, Campanile, Nine Floor Goddess Shrine, Tombstone Temple, Carnival Performance Show, Square Du Dome. Have lunch at a restaurant (Buffet). Take the Lava Train from Sun Kingdom to new attractions: Helios waterfall, Time Gate, The Moon Kingdom. Enjoy Fantasy Park: Fairy Forest, Dinosaur Park, 5D wild west, 4D death race ride, 3D mega 360 degrees, journey into the underground, Jurassic Park, Freefall Tower, Horror House, and over 90 free games. 3:00 PM: Return to the Cable Car to leave Ba Na Hills. 4:45 – 5:45 PM: Minivan brings you back to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An - Fly to Ho Chi Minh
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. After breakfast, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to Da Nang airport for your flight to Ho Chi Minh city. Upon your arrival at Tan Son Nhat airport, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel to check in. Enjoy your rest! Overnight in Ho Chi Minh city

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Visit Independence Palace (Reunification Palace). See French Colonial structures: Notre Dame Cathedral and the historic Central Post Office. Explore the War Remnants Museum. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (approx. 1.5-hour bus ride). Receive a brief introduction and watch an introductory video about the tunnels' construction and wartime survival. Explore the remaining tunnel area and systems, including living areas, kitchens, bedrooms, storage, weapon factories, field hospitals, and command centers. See hidden trap doors and dangerous traps. Enjoy special tea and cassava (guerilla food). Break time for relaxation or optional shooting range experience. Return to Saigon. End of the trip for the day. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh city

days.title: Mekong Delta Full Day

Board a sampan and cruise down the Mekong River, passing Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, and Tortoise islands. Stop at Unicorn Island: Walk around country lanes and see orchards. Enjoy tropical fruits and folk song music performed by locals. Visit a fruit plantation. Ride a hand-rowed sampan through Thoi Son canal. Visit a family business, a honey-bee farm (enjoy honey tea), and a coconut candy workshop. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Afternoon: Cycle around Tan Thach village, meet local villagers, and experience daily life in the Mekong Delta. Option for hammock relaxation and enjoying the breeze for those not cycling. Return to Ho Chi Minh City. End of the trip for the day. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh city

days.title: Ho Chi Minh Departure
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time until your driver arrives to transfer you to the airport for your onward flight.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Mekong Delta Tour

days.title: Nha Trang – Island and Snorkelling

days.title: Ha Noi Arrival
days.details: Welcome to Hanoi, Vietnam! Upon landing at Noi Bai International Airport, retrieve your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look out for our guide or driver, who will be holding a sign with your name on it. In case of any difficulty finding him, you're welcome to reach out to us via call or WhatsApp at +84 905 510 358 for immediate assistance. We will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in the heart of Hanoi. After checking in, the remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the vibrant city. Known for its centuries-old architecture and rich culture with Southeast Asian, Chinese, and French influences, Hanoi is the spirited capital city of Vietnam. It's also famous for its delectable cuisine, silk textiles, and bustling Old Quarter, where the narrow streets are roughly arranged by trade. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Ha Noi City Half Day - Bat Trang Village Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, Our guide and driver picks you up at your hotel. Begin your tour of Hanoi's most important cultural and historical sites. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum complex, including Ba Dinh Square. Note: Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum closed on Tuesday and Friday. Explore Ho Chi Minh's Stilt House and the One Pillar Pagoda, an iconic Buddhist temple. The Temple of Literature offers insights into the Confucian legacy of education in Vietnam. Visit the Old Quarter with Hoan Kiem Lake and Ngoc Son Temple. Have Lunch at the local restaurant. After lunch, start your afternoon to the Bat Trang Pottery Village, known for its traditional pottery making. Once there, watch local artisans shape, paint, and glaze their ceramic works, continuing a long-held family tradition. Stroll through the village market to see various ceramic products like vases and painted plates. Try making your own pottery in a workshop, guided by experienced potters. Spend some free time exploring the village, visiting small kilns, and maybe purchasing some unique ceramics to take home. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Ha Noi Incense Village Private Tour
days.details: At 8:00AM, Our guide and driver pick you up from your hotel and transfer you to Quang Phu Cau, a village known for its incense making tradition. Upon arrival, your guide will introduce you to the village's history and the importance of incense in Vietnamese culture. You'll have the opportunity to witness the incense-making process, which has been practiced for generations in this village. The artisans, often working in family-run workshops, will demonstrate how they prepare the incense sticks by hand. The village's narrow streets are filled with colorful incense sticks drying in the sun. You can watch the intricate process of making incense, from rolling the sticks in fragrant powders to drying and painting them in vibrant colors. These scents and colors hold deep spiritual and cultural significance in Vietnam, especially in ancestor worship. You'll also have time to explore the village, interact with locals, and see how incense production supports many families. Engage with artisans to learn how incense is used in religious ceremonies, and some tours even let you try making your own incense sticks. Have lunch at a local restaurant. After lunch, the driver will transfer back to the hotel, and you have free day in the afternoon. Overnight in Ha Noi
