days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour - Making Lantern Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, start your exploration of Hoi An Ancient Town, a well-preserved UNESCO World Heritage site. Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House, which offers a glimpse into the architecture and cultural fusion of this former trading port. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall, known for its intricate architecture and cultural significance. Next to visit The Japanese Covered Bridge. It is an iconic symbol of the ancient town, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market, where you can see a colorful array of goods being sold, from food to fabrics. Optionally, end your tour with a visit to a rooftop café for scenic views or participate in a lantern-making workshop to create memorable keepsake. Have lunch at the local restaurant. In the afternoon, the driver will take you to the place where you can learn to make lanterns, and here you will learn the steps involved in making a lantern. Return to your hotel, with the rest of the day at your disposal to relax or explore more of the city. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Cycling to Tra Que & Coconut Palm Forest
days.details: Have a breafast at your hotel. At 8:00, Begin your day in Hoi An with a hotel pick-up and set off on a bicycle ride towards the serene Cam Thanh region. Your first adventure is a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest, where you'll navigate the calm waterways, enveloped by lush mangroves and towering palms, offering a tranquil start to your day. Following your exploration of the waterways, cycle to the aromatic Tra Que Vegetable Village, where a delightful lunch awaits. Savor the flavors of local dishes prepared with fresh, organic produce from the surrounding gardens, offering a true taste of the region's culinary heritage. Post-lunch, take the opportunity to explore Tra Que Village further. Immerse yourself in the daily life and traditional farming practices of this vibrant community, surrounded by lush herb gardens and verdant fields. Conclude your day with a leisurely bike ride back to your hotel, carrying with you the memories and serene experiences of Hoi An's natural beauty and rich cultural tapestry. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Collect all your luggage and check out of the hotel, today we will move to Da Nang. 8:00 AM: Begin your excursion with a hotel pick-up, setting off for a day of wonder at Ba Na Hills. Experience the unique phenomenon of four distinct seasons in a single day, along with the many festivals, activities, and cuisines the area has to offer. Ascend by cable car, which holds the world record for the longest non-stop single-track cable car at 5,801 meters. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. Visit the Golden Bridge, one of Vietnam's most famous attractions. This 150-meter pedestrian bridge, supported by two giant stone hands, offers stunning views of the mountains and forests. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour, a series of nine themed gardens filled with beautiful flowers, sculptures, and fountains, Linh Ung Pagoda. Head to Fantasy Park, one of Vietnam's largest indoor amusement parks, offering rides, games, and attractions for all ages. Enjoy a buffet lunch at a restaurant on Ba Na Hills. After lunch, explore the French Village. It is a replica of classical and romantic France in our fantasy, through a string of peculiar architectural clusters. Return to your hotel in Da Nang, filled with memories from your sky-high adventure and the spectacular sights. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Da Nang - God of Wealth Mountain
days.details: 07:45 – 08:15 The diver and tour guide pick up you from the hotel. 09:15: Stop at the reception station of the tourist area, the group arranges their belongings, receives entrance tickets and prepares to start the trip for fun and relaxation. 09:30: The electric car takes the group to the "Dragon Ball" area with a large swimming pool and water games for children and adults. Experience the winding, mysterious "lazy river" in the heart of Long Tien cave with a swimming float, relax with a Ficus massage chair, bathe in Turkish Sauna, Russian Sauna. 12:00: Buffet lunch and rest at the restaurant. 13:00: Continue the journey to explore the natural hot mineral lake, visit the water park, dinosaur park, watch 9D and 12D movies. Soak and enjoy boiled eggs in the mineral mine. Or you can also choose to enjoy your own space, try the feeling of tea, milk, mud, coffee, wine bath services, or Onsen bath (Self-paid). In addition, Bird Nest Area is home to many great thrill rides for active young people. 14:30: The whole group moves to Dinosaur Park, the most attractive playground for children. There are many types of dinosaurs, always moving and making interesting sounds. 15:00 You also have the opportunity to visit tourist attractions such as: Son Than Temple, the largest natural stone bathtub in Vietnam. In the rich botanical garden there are trees such as: Rambutan Garden, Lychee Garden, Mango Garden. Promises to bring experiences that tourists love to go on Than Tai Mountain Tour. 16:00 The group gathers with the tour guide to leave Nui Than Tai, get on the bus and depart for Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang

days.title: Da Nang Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. Today is your free day, so you can take a rest at the hotel or start by enjoying the sunrise at My Khe Beach, feeling the fresh ocean breeze. Then, I explore Marble Mountains, admiring the stunning caves and pagodas. In the afternoon, I relax at a cozy café by the Han River, sipping Vietnamese coffee and watching the city life. To end the day, I take a stroll across the Dragon Bridge, amazed by its colorful lights. Overnight in Da Nang

days.title: Da Nang, Fly to Ho Chi Minh (Sai Gon)
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. A car will pick you up and drive you to Danang Airport. Fly to Ho Chi Minh City. When you arrive at Tan Son Nhat Airport, a car will take you to your hotel in the city center. Move smoothly from the calm streets of Hoi An to the lively Ho Chi Minh City, ready for a new experience. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Have Breakfast at your hotel. At 8 am: Our driver and guide will meet you at your hotel in HCM city center and start the morning trip to visit Independence Palace (also called the Reunification palace). This palace was built on the sight of the former Norodom palace. It was designed by the architect Ngo Viet Thu and is a widely known landmark of Ho Chi Minh City. After the Independence Palace, our car will take you to visit the beautiful structures from the French Colonial times such as Notre Dame Cathedral, the historic Central Post Office. Followed by the remarkable site of the War Remnants Museum which has a vast display of the both the Indochina wars. At about 12 pm: Enjoy local food at a local restaurant. After lunch, we will depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (The trip takes approximately 1,5 hours car driving). Upon arrival, before exploring the tunnels, you will see a short introductory video about the tunnels. By watching this video, you can learn how the tunnels were constructed and how the people survived in the harsh conditions of the war time. Then, with the guide, you will explore the remaining area and tunnel systems. This system includes the special constructed living areas with kitchens, bedrooms side by side with other martial facilities like storage, weapons factories, field hospitals, and command centers helping whoever lives inside the tunnels meet their basic needs. Besides, you will also see many hidden trap doors and dangerous traps within the maze-like tunnels for security purpose during the war. Afterward, you will have a chance to taste a special tea and cassava (these are guerilla's food during the war). Take a relax or you can try the real shooting gun. After Cu Chi tunnels, transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Mekong Delta Full Day
days.details: Have a breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 Leave the bustling Ho Chi Minh City behind and set off for My Tho, nestled by the Mekong River. Begin with a serene visit to the historic Vinh Trang Pagoda. Boarding the sampan and cruising down the river around the four beautiful islands known as Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix and Tortoise islands. Visit one of fishing pens and have a looks fishing boats parking here after catching in the sea and bustle of fishing dock. Crossing the large river to the otherside in Ben tre. Continue on Xep canals winding through coconut jungle and palm trees, mangro trees growing up wildly along the waterway. Change riding a hand-rowed sampan through canal and treat yourself in the beauty of the countryside. Step ashore, get in the local houses to see bee farms made by farmers and enjoy some fruits, honey tea and listen to local music show as well. Hop on moto cart on village paths and visit the family coconut candy workshop, enjoy some sweets by the way. Have lunch at local restaurant. Crossing back large Mekong river to pier in My Tho. Transfer back to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Ho Chi Minh Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. This is your free day leiure, you can visit the War Remnants Museum to learn about history and explore the vibrant atmosphere of Bến Thành Market. In the afternoon, I relax at a rooftop café, enjoying the view of the bustling city. As night falls, I take a walk along Nguyễn Huệ Walking Street, soaking in the lively energy and street performances. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Ho Chi Minh Airport Drop Off
days.details: Breakfast at your Hotel. You have free time until your driver arrives to pick you up from your hotel to take you to the airport for your onward flight.

15-mc.name: Private Vietnam - Cambodia 15 Days 14 Nights - Indochina Ride (Detailed)

days.title: Ha Noi Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Noi Bai International Airport, collect luggage, and meet our guide/driver (look for name sign). Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Hanoi. The rest of the day is free for relaxation or initial exploration of Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Hanoi City Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Tour guide picks you up for a full-day Hanoi exploration. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (dress modestly: shoulders to knees). See the Mausoleum (closed Mondays & Fridays), Presidential Palace, and Stilt House. Explore the unique One Pillar Pagoda in its peaceful gardens. Visit the Temple of Literature, known for its architecture and historical importance. Enjoy a local lunch at a nearby restaurant. Afternoon Options: If Monday or Ethnology Museum closed: Visit the Women's Museum. Otherwise: Visit the Ethnology Museum (details not in provided text). Explore the Old Quarter and the serene Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Ha Noi – Hoa Lu – Tam Coc
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up from your Hanoi hotel for a trip to Ninh Binh. Explore Hoa Lu, the ancient capital, visiting the temples of the Dinh and Le Dynasties. Enjoy a local lunch featuring Ninh Binh specialties. Experience a serene sampan boat ride in Tam Coc ("Halong Bay on land") along the Ngo Dong River, passing limestone karsts and rice paddies. Visit Thai Vi Temple, dedicated to historical Vietnamese kings and figures. Return to Hanoi in the late afternoon. Overnight in Ha Noi

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: 8:30 – 8:50: Limousine bus pick-up from your hotel. 12:00: Arrive at Tuan Chau Marina (No. 34), welcomed by Mon Cheri Cruise crew (reception contact: +84 987671669 / +84 936905115). 12:30: Transfer to Mon Chéri Cruise, itinerary briefing onboard. 13:00: Welcome drinks, wet towels, and special lunch served while cruising towards Lan Ha Bay. Enjoy fresh seafood and other delicacies amidst the stunning scenery of Lan Ha Bay. 15:30: Visit Tra Bau area (unspoiled natural beauty). Enjoy kayaking to explore limestone islands or swim/relax in the Jacuzzi. 17:30 - 18:30: Participate in a cooking demonstration (spring rolls) or admire the sunset over the Gulf of Tonkin from the top deck (Happy Hour: buy one get one free at the bar). 19:30: Enjoy a delicious local dinner prepared by the chef in a romantic setting. 21:00 – 22:00: Relax with cocktails/drinks at the sky bar (surcharge), enjoy spa services (optional), stargaze, or try squid fishing. Overnight in Ha Long Bay

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi – Fly to Da Nang – Hoi An
days.details: 6:00: Start the day with Tai Chi and enjoy the sunrise. 6:45 - 7:15: Breakfast served while cruising back to Gia Luan jetty (breakfast time may vary). 7:30 - 9:00: Transfer to Cat Ba Island and explore Trung Trang Cave (impressive limestone cave). 9:30: Return to the main boat, check out of cabin (luggage outside). Lunch is served. Settle bar bill. 10:30 - 11:00: Disembark Mon Cheri Cruises, transfer back to Tuan Chau Marina (Block #34). Relax and wait for luggage. 11:30 - 12:00: Guests ready at Tuan Chau Marina. 15:00: Limousine bus drops you off at Aeon Mall Long Bien, where your driver will take you to Noi Bai Airport for your flight to Da Nang. Arrive at Da Nang International Airport, meet your driver, and transfer to your hotel in Hoi An for check-in and rest. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour – Basket Boat – Tra Que Village
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for Cam Thanh region. Enjoy a peaceful bamboo basket boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Continue to Tra Que Vegetable Village for a delightful lunch with fresh, organic produce. Explore Tra Que Village, observing daily life and traditional farming. 14:00: Begin your exploration of Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site). Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Optional: Visit a rooftop café for views or participate in a lantern-making workshop. Return to your hotel, rest of the day at leisure. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An – Ba Na Hills
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a day trip to Ba Na Hills. Experience four seasons in one day, festivals, activities, and diverse cuisine. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car (5,801 meters) with panoramic mountain views. Visit the Golden Bridge, a 150-meter pedestrian bridge supported by giant stone hands, offering stunning views. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park with rides and games. Enjoy a buffet lunch at a restaurant in Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village, a replica of classical and romantic French architecture. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An

days.title: Hoi An – Fly to Ho Chi Minh
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Your driver will pick you up from your hotel and transfer you to Da Nang Airport for your flight to Ho Chi Minh City. Upon arrival at Tan Son Nhat Airport, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel for check-in. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Ho Chi Minh City at your own pace. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City – Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Meet your driver and guide at your hotel in HCM city center. Visit the Independence Palace (Reunification Palace). Explore French colonial structures: Notre Dame Cathedral and the historic Central Post Office. Visit the War Remnants Museum. Around 12 PM: Enjoy local food at a local restaurant. After lunch, depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (approx. 1.5-hour drive). Watch an introductory video about the tunnels. Explore the remaining tunnel systems, including living areas, kitchens, hospitals, and command centers. See hidden trap doors and dangerous traps. Taste special tea and cassava (guerilla food). Optional: Try shooting a real gun. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Ho Chi Minh – Mekong Delta Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Depart Ho Chi Minh City for My Tho (Mekong Delta). Visit the historic Vinh Trang Pagoda. Take a sampan cruise to Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, and Tortoise islands. Unicorn Island: Explore orchards, enjoy local fruits and music, visit a fruit plantation. Glide through Thoi Son canal. Visit a honey-bee farm and sample honey tea. Visit a coconut candy workshop. Enjoy a local lunch. Optional: Cycling trip around Tan Thach village or relax in a hammock. Return to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh

days.title: Ho Chi Minh – Fly to Phnom Penh
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Your driver will pick you up from your hotel and transfer you to Tan Son Nhat Airport for your flight to Phnom Penh. Upon arrival at Phnom Penh International Airport, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel for check-in. Overnight in Phnom Penh

days.title: Phnom Penh City Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Visit the Killing Fields "Choeung Ek" (site of brutal executions during the Pol Pot regime). Continue to the Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum (S21 prison), a former high school used for detention and torture by the Khmer Rouge. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Afternoon visit to the Russian Market (Psah Tuol Thom Pong) for souvenirs, jewelry, carvings, etc. Continue to the National Museum, an architectural gem designed in Khmer style. Transfer to your hotel. Overnight in Phnom Penh

days.title: Phnom Penh – Siem Reap with Private Transfer
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Check out of the hotel after breakfast and transfer to Siem Reap with your driver and guide (approx. 5-hour drive, 312 km). After lunch en route, visit Kompong Pluk floating village (approx. 50km from Siem Reap) on Tonle Sap Lake. Explore the floating fishing villages, submerged forests, and fishing farms by boat. Observe floating houses and flooded forests, experiencing life on the water. After the floating village visit, continue to Siem Reap and transfer directly to your hotel. Overnight in Seam Reap

days.title: Siem Reap Temple Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Morning: Meet your tour guide at the hotel lobby. Visit Angkor Wat (World Heritage Site), famous for its beauty and the longest continuous bas-relief depicting Hindu mythology. Continue to Angkor Thom (12th century): See the South Gate (churning of the ocean of milk statues). Explore Bayon Temple (54 towers with over 200 smiling faces of Avolokitesvara). Visit the Royal Enclosure, Phimeanakas, Elephant Terrace, and Terrace of the Leper King. Lunch at a local restaurant (own account). Afternoon: Visit Ta Prohm Temple (mid-12th – early 13th century), partially unrestored with trees growing through the structures ("jungle atmosphere"). Dinner at your own arrangement and own account. Overnight in Seam Reap

days.title: Siem Reap Departure
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time until your driver picks you up for your transfer to the airport.

16-northern.name: Private Vietnam 16 Days 15 Nights - Northern Vietnam Discovery (Detailed)

days.title: Welcome to Hanoi
days.details: Airport pickup at Noi Bai International Airport (look for sign with your name). Hotel check-in and free time to explore Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi Countryside & Jeep Tour
days.details: 8:00 AM: Hotel pickup for Quang Phu Cau incense village. Learn about incense history and its cultural importance. Witness the traditional incense-making process. Explore the village, interact with locals, and see family workshops. Opportunity to try making incense. Lunch at a local restaurant. 1:00 PM: Hotel pickup by Hanoi Jeep team. Scenic Jeep ride through Hanoi's Old Quarter and outskirts to the countryside. Cross the Red River and explore tranquil villages. See vast green rice paddies and observe local farm life. Visit a local market. Explore the historical Co Loa Citadel, dedicated to King An Duong Vuong. Visit a local fruit farm and enjoy fresh tropical fruits. Jeep ride back to Hanoi along the Red River, enjoying the landscape. Return to hotel after the afternoon Jeep tour. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi City Tour & Night Train to Sapa
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pickup for Hanoi city tour. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, Stilt House - Mausoleum closed Mon, Fri & Jun 15 - Aug 15). See the One Pillar Pagoda. Explore the Temple of Literature. Enjoy local lunch. Visit the Old Quarter, Ngoc Son Temple & Quan Thanh Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Experience the Train Street. Return to hotel for rest and independent dinner. 8:30 PM: Transfer to the train station for the overnight train to Sapa. Overnight in On Train.

days.title: Sapa - Sin Chai Trekking & Fansipan Peak
days.details: 6:00 AM: Arrive at Sapa train station, meet guide & driver. Transfer to restaurant for breakfast & rest. 8:00 AM: Hotel pickup for trekking to Sin Chai village (Black H'mong). Explore the village, observe daily life, farming, and traditional crafts. Walk along rice paddies and corn hills by a river, enjoying the scenery. Visit a local house via a suspension bridge. Return to Sin Chai village and drive back to Sapa. Lunch at a local restaurant. 1:00 PM: Walk to Sunplaza for Muong Hoa Funicular to the Fansipan cable car station. Scenic cable car ride (approx. 20 mins) to 3,000m ASL. Climb 639 stone steps (approx. 40 mins) to the 3,143m Fansipan summit. Return via cable car and funicular. Visit Swing Sapa for photos and views. Free evening to explore Sapa town. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa - O Quy Ho, Waterfalls & Heaven's Gate
days.details: 8:00 AM: Meet guide and driver for a scenic trip. Drive through Hoang Lien National Park and O Quy Ho Pass to Silver Waterfall. Explore Silver Waterfall (best visited May-Oct). Continue to Love Waterfall, a popular spot. Optional stop at a local fruit orchard. Drive to Heaven's Gate (2047m) for panoramic valley views and potential Fansipan views. Return to hotel. Independent dinner. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa - Mong Village, Alpine Coaster & Glass Bridge
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart from Sapa to Mong Village. 9:00 AM: Experience the Mong Village Alpine Coaster (1095m track, mountain & valley views). 12:00 PM: Lunch at a local restaurant. 1:00 PM: Visit the Rong May Glass Bridge for thrilling panoramic views of mountains and valleys. 3:30 PM: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa to Ha Giang by Bus
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. 10:00 AM: Sleeper bus pickup from your hotel for a 6-hour scenic journey to Ha Giang. Check in to your hotel upon arrival in Ha Giang. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Ha Giang Loop - Quan Ba & Dong Van
days.details: 7:00 AM: Breakfast at Rocks Ha Giang Hostel. 8:00 AM: Start Ha Giang Loop motorbike adventure with the group and guide. Visit Bac Sum Pass. Explore Heaven's Gate in Quan Ba. Drive through Can Ty Pass. 12:00 PM: Local lunch in Yen Minh town. Continue through Tham Ma Pass. Explore Sung La Valley and visit Pao's House in Lung Cam Village. Visit the Hmong King's Palace. 5:00 PM: Arrive and check in to a hotel in Dong Van town. 7:30 PM: Dinner and walk in Dong Van Old Quarter. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Dong Van - Ma Pi Leng - Meo Vac
days.details: 7:00 AM: Breakfast and hotel check-out. Visit Lung Cu Flag Tower. Explore Lo Lo Chai village. Visit Ma Le Village. 12:30 PM: Lunch in Dong Van town. Drive the Happiness Road to Ma Pi Leng Pass. Stop at Pai Lung. Visit Panorama Coffee View Point. Sightseeing of the Nho Que River. 4:30 PM: Arrive and check in at a homestay in Pa Vi village (Meo Vac Town). 7:00 PM: Dinner and relaxation at the homestay. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Meo Vac to Pac Bo & Cao Bang
days.details: 7:00 AM: Breakfast and homestay check-out. Depart for Cao Bang. Visit Meo Vac town. Pass through Bao Lac small town. Drive over Me Pia Pass. 12:30 PM: Lunch in Bao Lac town. Continue to Pac Bo village. Explore Pac Bo village. 4:00 PM: Arrive at a homestay, check-in, and relax. 6:00 PM: Dinner at the homestay. Overnight in Cao Bang.

days.title: Ban Gioc Waterfall & Nguom Ngao Cave
days.details: 7:00 AM: Breakfast and depart to visit Ban Gioc Waterfall. Visit Nui Thung Valley. 10:00 AM: Arrive and explore Ban Gioc Waterfall. 12:30 PM: Lunch at a local restaurant. Continue to visit Nguom Ngao Cave. 4:30 PM: Check in at a homestay in Ban Gioc for the night. 6:30 PM: Dinner and overnight at the homestay. Overnight in Cao Bang.

days.title: Ban Gioc to Hanoi
days.details: 7:00 AM: Breakfast and free time to explore Ban Gioc surroundings. 9:00 AM: Check out and depart for Cao Bang City. 10:30 AM: Visit Phuc Sen forging village (knife-making). 12:00 PM: Arrive in Cao Bang City for rest and lunch. 2:00 PM: Depart by Limousine Bus to Hanoi (arrival approx. 9:00 PM). Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hoa Lu, Trang An & Mua Cave
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pickup for Ninh Binh. Visit Hoa Lu, the ancient capital, and explore Dinh and Le Temples. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Take a boat trip through the karst landscape of Trang An (UNESCO site). Hike up to Mua Cave for panoramic views. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay - Lan Ha Bay Cruise
days.details: 8:30 - 8:50 AM: Limousine bus pickup from your hotel. 12:00 PM: Welcome by Mon Cheri Cruise crew at Tuan Chau Marina (No. 34). 12:30 PM: Transfer to Mon Cheri Cruise, itinerary briefing onboard. 1:00 PM: Welcome drinks and lunch served while cruising Lan Ha Bay. 3:30 PM: Visit Tra Bau area, kayaking to explore Lan Ha Bay's beauty. Optional swimming or Jacuzzi. 5:30 - 6:30 PM: Cooking demonstration (spring rolls) or enjoy sunset on the top deck (Happy Hour at the bar). 7:30 PM: Dinner with delicious local food. 9:00 - 10:00 PM: Relax with cocktails at the sky bar (surcharge), optional spa, stargazing, or squid fishing. Overnight on Mon Cheri Cruise. Overnight in Ha Long Bay.

days.title: Lan Ha & Ha Long Bay Cruise - Hanoi
days.details: 6:00 AM: Tai Chi session and sunrise viewing. 6:45 - 7:15 AM: Breakfast served while cruising back to Gia Luan jetty. 7:30 - 9:00 AM: Transfer to Trung Trang Cave (Cat Ba Biosphere) for a tour. 9:30 AM: Return to the main boat, cabin check-out, luggage placed outside. Lunch served at the restaurant (settle bar bill). 10:30 - 11:00 AM: Disembark Mon Cheri Cruises, transfer back to Tuan Chau Marina (Block #34). 11:30 - 12:00 PM: Guests ready at Tuan Chau Marina. 3:00 PM: Arrive back at your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi Departure
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. Transfer to Noi Bai International Airport for your departure.

18-nature.name: Private Vietnam 18 Days 17 Nights - Nature & Culture Escape (Detailed)

days.title: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Tan Son Nhat International Airport (Ho Chi Minh City). Meet guide/driver holding a sign with your name. Transfer to your hotel in central Ho Chi Minh City. Free time for relaxation or initial city exploration. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Meet your driver and guide at your hotel. Visit the Independence Palace (Reunification Palace). Explore French Colonial architecture: Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office. Visit the War Remnants Museum. ~12:00 PM: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (~1.5-hour drive). Watch an introductory video about the tunnels. Explore the remaining tunnel systems: living areas, kitchens, bedrooms, martial facilities, storage, weapon factories, field hospitals, command centers. See hidden trap doors and dangerous traps. Taste special tea and cassava (guerrilla food). Option to try shooting a real gun (at your own expense). Transfer back to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Cai Be – Cu Lao- An Binh - Vinh Long
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 9:00 AM: Pick up and transfer to Cai Be tourist wharf. Depart by boat along the Cai Be River to visit the Cai Be floating market. Visit local traditional craft villages: rice paper kilns, candy kilns, green rice kilns, longan drying kilns. Short walk to a honey tea spot in a fruit garden; learn about beekeeping and enjoy honey tea. Boat trip upstream across the Tien River to Tan Phong Islet. Rowing boat trip on a small canal (~20 minutes). Walk in the fruit garden (~10 minutes) and enjoy fresh fruit. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Continue up the Tien River; lunch at a garden house. Disembark at Vinh Long Wharf. Admire My Thuan Suspension Bridge on the way back to Ho Chi Minh City. Transfer back to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Sai Gon - Fly to Phu Quoc Island
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Transfer to Tan Son Nhat Airport for your flight to Phu Quoc Island. Upon arrival at Phu Quoc Airport, meet your driver and transfer to your hotel for check-in. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Phu Quoc Island at your own pace. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Sightseeing South & North Together Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 09:00 AM: Pick up from your hotel lobby in Duong Dong town center (with potential extra fees for other areas). South Phu Quoc Visit: Pearl Farm: Learn about pearl harvesting. Sim Wine Factory: See local wine production. Pepper Farm: Explore a local pepper garden. Ham Ninh Fishing Village: Visit the local fishing community. Ho Quoc Pagoda: Enjoy scenic views uphill. Bai Sao Beach: Relax, swim, sunbathe (lunch here if booked with lunch). Coconut Prison: Learn about its wartime history. Fish Sauce Factory: See local fish sauce production. Tranh Stream Waterfall: Light trekking (no stop during rainy season - May to October). Sun Premier Village Primavera: Visit the Bell Tower and Kiss Bridge. Lunch options (if booked): Sao Beach, Rach Vem, or Dai Beach. North Phu Quoc Visit: Bee Farm. National Park: Enjoy a light walk in the forest. Rach Vem Village (Starfish Beach): Swimming. Ganh Dau Cape: Viewpoint overlooking Cambodia. 17:00 PM: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to explore Phu Quoc Island at your own leisure. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc - Fly to Da Nang
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Transfer to Phu Quoc Airport for your flight to Da Nang City. Upon arrival at Da Nang Airport, meet your driver and transfer to your hotel for check-in. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Da Nang City at your own pace. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a full-day trip to Ba Na Hills. Experience four seasons in one day. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car, enjoying panoramic mountain views. Visit the Golden Bridge. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour gardens and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy Fantasy Park (indoor amusement park). Have a buffet lunch at Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Marble Mountain - Linh Ung Pagoda - Han Market
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a half-day trip to Marble Mountain. Visit Huyen Khong and Tang Chon caves. Ascend Thuy Son (Water Mountain) to see Tam Thai Pagoda and Linh Ung Pagoda (Marble Mountain). 12:00 PM: Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit Han Market for souvenir shopping and local delicacies. Transfer to Linh Ung Pagoda on Son Tra Peninsula, known for its Guanyin statue and scenic views. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour & Basket Boat Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Begin your exploration of the Cam Thanh region with a peaceful bamboo basket boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Explore Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site). Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Hoi An - My Son Half Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a half-day trip to My Son Sanctuary. Discover the ancient Hindu temples of the Champa Kingdom. Enjoy a traditional Cham dance performance. Return to your hotel around 12:00 PM. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Transfer back to your hotel, end of the trip for the day. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Scenic Train Journey from Da Nang to Hue
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Transfer to the Da Nang train station. Embark on a scenic train journey to Hue via the Hai Van Pass, enjoying panoramic views of mountains and the sea, fishing villages, beaches, and forests. Arrive in Hue and meet your driver at the train station. Transfer to your hotel for check-in. Enjoy your rest. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue City Full Day Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a full-day tour of Hue's historical sites. Visit Minh Mang Tomb. Enjoy a boat ride to Thien Mu Pagoda. Have lunch at a restaurant in the city center. Explore Tu Duc Tomb. Visit Dong Ba Market. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. Enjoy a relaxing free day at your hotel, with options to use the amenities (pool, spa), order local Hue specialties, or simply rest. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue - Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. Transfer to the airport for your flight to Ha Noi. Upon arrival at Noi Bai International Airport, meet your guide or driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Ha Noi. Free time to relax or begin exploring the Old Quarter. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Hoa Lu – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick up from your hotel for a trip to Ninh Binh. Visit Hoa Lu ancient capital: Dinh and Le Temples. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Explore Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex with a mesmerizing boat ride through limestone karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave): Climb ~500 steps for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Ha Noi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: 08:00 – 08:30 AM: La Regina Classic Cruise pick up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter (optional). 11:30 AM: Arrive at Halong International Cruise Port, enjoy a welcome drink and express check-in. 12:15 PM: Check in aboard, welcome drink, safety briefing, and cruise to Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15 PM: Enjoy lunch in the restaurant. 15:30 PM: Explore Thien Canh Son cave (hiking recommended). 17:30 PM: Enjoy sunset on the bay and 'Happy Hour'. 18:00 PM: Cooking class on the sundeck (Deep Fried Spring rolls). 19:30 PM: Dinner served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 21:00 PM: Relax on the boat or join squid fishing. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi Departure
days.details: 06:30 AM: Start your day with Tai Chi on the sundeck. 07:00 AM: Light breakfast served in the dining room. 07:45 AM: Visit Vung Vieng floating fishing village (optional bamboo boat or kayaking). 09:00 AM: Return to the main boat for relaxing and check-out. Leave luggage outside cabin door. 09:45 AM: Brunch is served in the restaurant while the boat returns to the harbor. 11:00 AM: Disembark at the harbor. Transfer to Noi Bai Airport in Ha Noi for your departure. End of tour.

19-explore.name: Private Vietnam 19 Days 18 Nights - Explore Vietnam (Detailed)

days.title: Arrival Day in Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon)
days.details: Warmly welcome to Vietnam! Upon arrival at the airport, you will be warmly greeted by our tour guide and driver who will escort you to your hotel in Saigon for check-in and relaxation. Overnight in HCM.

days.title: Sai Gon City & Cu Chi Tunnel
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart from your HCM city center hotel with your driver and guide. Visit Independence Palace, Notre Dame Cathedral, the historic Central Post Office, and the War Remnants Museum. Around 12:00 PM: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. After lunch, depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (approx. 1.5-hour drive). Watch an introductory video. Explore the tunnel systems (living areas, kitchens, bedrooms, hospitals, etc.), hidden traps. Taste tea and cassava (guerilla food). Option to try shooting. Transfer back to your hotel after visiting the Cu Chi Tunnels. Overnight in HCM.

days.title: Sai Gon City - Mekong Delta Discovery
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart Ho Chi Minh City for My Tho (Mekong River). Visit the historic Vinh Trang Pagoda. Board a sampan and cruise around the four islands (Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, Tortoise). Visit a fishing pen and see fishing boats. Cross to Ben Tre and navigate the Xep canals by hand-rowed sampan through coconut and mangrove landscapes. Visit local houses, see bee farms, enjoy fruits and honey tea, and listen to local music. Ride a moto cart on village paths and visit a coconut candy workshop. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Cross the Mekong River back to My Tho pier. Transfer back to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in HCM.

days.title: Sai Gon - Fly to Phu Quoc Island
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. After breakfast, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to Tan Son Nhat airport for your flight to Phu Quoc island. Upon your arrival at Phu Quoc airport, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel to check in. Enjoy the rest of the day exploring Phu Quoc island at your own pace. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc - 4 Island Day Tour Join in Group
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 9:00 AM: Tour guide picks you up and transfers you to Khem Beach (stop at a Pearl farm). 9:30 AM - 1:30 PM: Speed boat trip to 4 islands: May Rut Trong Island: Swimming, flycam video, lunch. May Rut Ngoai Island: Swimming, photos with SUP and flycam. Nautilus Cruise Entertainment Complex: Optional Namaste Seawalker and water sports (self-paid). Gam Ghi Island or Roi Island: Swimming (with vest), snorkeling. 2:00 PM: Arrive at Thom Island, enjoy Aquatopia water park. 4:30 PM: Return to the mainland by Cable car (20 mins, panoramic views of An Thoi fishing village). 5:00 PM - 5:30 PM: Return to your hotel. End of trip. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc Free Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy your leisurely day exploring Phu Quoc at your own pace. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc - Fly to Da Nang - Drive to Hoi An
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. After breakfast, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to Phu Quoc airport for your flight to Da Nang city. Upon your arrival at Da Nang airport, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel in Hoi An to check in. Enjoy the rest of your day exploring Hoi An city at your own pace. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour - Basket Boat Ride - Tra Que Village
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Morning: Electric shuttle car tour of Hoi An's countryside, followed by a basket boat ride in the water coconut forest to learn local fishing. Enjoy a tour of Tra Que vegetable village and a cooking class with lunch. Afternoon: Discover Hoi An's ancient town, including the Japanese Covered Bridge and Tan Ky old house, followed by a visit to the local market. Return to the hotel, relax by the pool. Evening: Explore the Hoi An night market at your leisure. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills - Golden Bridge
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a day trip to Ba Na Hills. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car, enjoying panoramic mountain views and the Golden Bridge. Enjoy lunch at a restaurant on Ba Na Hills. Spend the afternoon exploring the French Village, pagodas, and gardens. Optional amusement rides. Transfer back to your hotel in Hoi An. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Free Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy your leisurely day exploring Hoi An city at your own pace. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Flight to Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Transfer to the airport for your flight to Hanoi. Upon arrival at Noi Bai Airport (Hanoi), our guide or driver will meet you at arrivals (look for your name). Contact (+84) 905 315 547 for assistance. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Hanoi. Free time to relax or explore the Old Quarter. Overnight in Hanoi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Hoa Lu - Tam Coc Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Car picks you up for a trip to Ninh Binh. Visit Hoa Lu, the ancient capital, and explore the Dinh and Le Temples. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant in Tam Coc. Take a sampan boat ride through Tam Coc, enjoying the limestone cliffs and river scenery ('Ha Long Bay on land'). Enjoy a 45-minute cycling trip around the village. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave) and climb to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi City Tour - Night Train to Sapa
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. 9:00 AM: Tour guide picks you up for a full-day Hanoi exploration. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, and Stilt House - note Mausoleum closures). See the unique One Pillar Pagoda. Explore the Temple of Literature, the first university of Vietnam. Enjoy a local lunch. Visit Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Visit St. Joseph's Cathedral. Transfer back to your hotel. Free time to relax or have dinner. 8:00 PM: Driver picks you up for a night train to Lao Cai. Train departs around 9:00-10:00 PM, arriving in Lao Cai around 5:00-6:00 AM. Overnight on the train.

days.title: Sa Pa - Silverwater Fall - Heaven Gate
days.details: Upon arrival at Lao Cai train station, your driver will pick you up and transfer you to a restaurant for breakfast. After breakfast, begin your half-day tour exploring Sapa. Enjoy a scenic drive uphill towards Fansipan Mountain, passing rose and chayote farms. Stop at the magnificent Silver Waterfall. Continue to Heaven Gate and Tram Ton Pass, the highest mountain pass in Vietnam (2047m). Enjoy 30 minutes to walk around and admire the breathtaking panoramic views of the Hoang Lien Son mountain range. On the return downhill journey (7km), stop to take pictures of lush farms in O Quy Ho. Transfer back to Sapa and get dropped off at your hotel or requested location. Overnight in Sapa.

days.title: Sapa - Fansipan Peak - Moana
days.details: Enjoy breakfast and check out of your hotel. You can leave your luggage at reception. 8:00 AM: Meet your guide and driver for a trip to the O Quy Ho cable car station (approx. 15 mins). A 20-minute cable car ride takes you to a station at 3,000m above sea level, with views of the Sin Chai valley, Fansipan peak, and Hoang Lien National Park. Climb 600 stone steps (approx. 40 mins) to reach the 3,143m summit. The return journey to Sapa takes about an hour. 12:00 PM: Lunch at a local restaurant. After lunch, walk 700m to Moana View, a check-in station with a Bali Gate, Infinity Lake, Moana Girl statue, Golden Hand, swing, lonely tree, and a panoramic café with views of Fansipan peak and Muong Hoa valley. Overnight in Sapa.

days.title: Sapa - Ha Noi by Bus
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. You will have free morning relaxing at the hotel or exploring Sa Pa at your own pace. At 14:00 PM: A shuttle bus will pick you up from the hotel and transport you to your accommodation in Hanoi. The journey takes approximately 8 hours. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 7:45 – 8:30 AM: Shuttle bus picks you up from your hotel in Hanoi and starts the trip to Halong Bay. Quick stop at Pearl Village. 12:00-12:30 PM: Arrive at Halong International Cruise Port. Relax and enjoy tea/coffee. Transfer to the boat by tender. 12:45 PM: Welcome drink and safety briefing. Check into your cabin. 1:30 PM: Vietnamese set menu lunch while cruising into Bai Tu Long Bay. 3:00 PM: Arrive at the kayaking area (Cap La Island). Enjoy kayaking, swimming, and relaxing. 5:30 PM: Return to the boat and enjoy a sunset party. 7:00 PM: Set-dinner onboard. 8:30 PM: Free time for games, squid fishing, or cocktails. Overnight in Ha Long Bay.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi
days.details: 06:00: Start your day with Tai Chi on the sundeck or enjoy the stunning bay view with a cup of tea or coffee. 07:00: Breakfast served in Western style, with vegetarian options available, to energize you for the day ahead. 08:00: Explore the hidden Thien Canh Son Cave and relax on the white sandy beach at Hon Co Island. 09:00: Return to the boat for about 30 minutes to freshen up and finish packing. 10:00: Join a Vietnamese cooking demonstration and learn to make Nem Cuon, a dish once guided by Michelin-star chef Gordon Ramsay. 10:30-10:45: Enjoy a traditional Vietnamese lunch on the boat (vegetarian options available). 12:00: Return to the harbor and disembark at Bai Chay pier. 12:30: Farewell Halong Bay as the bus takes you back to Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi Departure
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. After breakfast, your driver will pick you up from the hotel and transfer you to Noi Bai airport for your onward flight. Safe travel!

days.title: Ha Noi Arrival
days.details: Welcome to Hanoi, Vietnam! Upon landing at Noi Bai International Airport, retrieve your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look out for our guide or driver, who will be holding a sign with your name on it. In case of any difficulty finding him, you're welcome to reach out to us via call or WhatsApp for immediate assistance. We will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in the heart of Hanoi. After checking in, the remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the vibrant city. Known for its centuries-old architecture and rich culture with Southeast Asian, Chinese, and French influences, Hanoi is the spirited capital city of Vietnam. It's also famous for its delectable cuisine, silk textiles, and bustling Old Quarter, where the narrow streets are roughly arranged by trade. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Highlights of Ha Noi - Photograph with Ao Dai
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, the tour guide picks you up from your hotel for a full day exploring Hanoi. Start at the Ho Chi Minh Complex. Remember to dress modestly, covering shoulders to knees. Visit the Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, and Stilt House. **Note: The Mausoleum is closed on Mondays and Fridays, and from June 15th to August 15th for annual maintenance; however, you can still take photos and explore the surrounding area. Next, see the unique One Pillar Pagoda set in tranquil gardens. Visit the Temple of Literature, known for its well-preserved architecture and historical significance. Enjoy a local lunch at a nearby restaurant. After lunch, if it's Monday or the Ethnology Museum is otherwise closed, visit the Women's Museum instead to explore exhibits on the life and history of Vietnamese women. Experience the bustling Old Quarter with the serene Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. End the day with a Water Puppet Show, a traditional Vietnamese art form. Return to your hotel around 5:00 PM, filled with memories of Hanoi's rich culture and history. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Hoa Lu – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00AM, Our guide and driver pick you up from your hotel for a journey to Ninh Binh. Upon arrival, visit the ancient capital of Hoa Lu. Explore the historic Dinh and Le Temples, dedicated to Emperor Dinh Tien Hoang and Emperor Le Dai Hanh, respectively. These temples showcase traditional Vietnamese architecture and offer a glimpse into Vietnam's rich imperial past. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex. Here, you'll embark on a mesmerizing boat ride, gliding through crystal-clear waters flanked by towering limestone karsts and lush vegetation. This journey through Trang An's caves and grottoes offers not only a visual feast but also a serene escape into the heart of Vietnam's natural beauty. Get back to the car, then leave for Mua Cave (Dancing Cave). Walk up almost 500 steps, you can reach the top of Lying Dragon Mountain & have an amazing panoramic view of Tam Coc from here. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Sapa by Shuttle Bus
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Your day begins early at 7:30 AM with a car pick-up from your hotel, setting off on a scenic 6-hour drive towards the picturesque Sapa. Upon arrival, savor a delicious lunch to recharge before checking into your hotel. Once settled, gear up for an afternoon trek, exploring the vibrant town of Sapa and immersing yourself in its stunning landscapes and rich cultural tapestry. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Silver Waterfall - Heaven Gate - Sin Chai Village
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Met up at your hotel in Sapa with a local guide and driver, then transferred towards the Silver Waterfall. After a short time to take a picture of the waterfall, we continue our drive to the Heaven Gate of Tram Ton, which can be considered as the highest peak of roads in Vietnam. Enjoy the marvellous views of Fansipan from the Gate, the highest peak of Indochina. Then we start our walking trip by going downhill a dirt trail, through the bamboo forest of Hoang Lien National Park. Your lunch will be served at a nice spot near a river. After lunch, we continue our trek to Sin Chai village, where Community-Based Tourism in Sapa takes place. Then we visit the village, inhabited by the Black Hmong people, one of the largest ethnic minorities in the Sapa area. In the late afternoon, we will be picked up by our car for the journey back to your hotel in Sapa. End of service. Approx: 1 hour driving/ 5-6 hours walking/1 hour lunch. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa - Cat Cat - Y Linh Ho - Lao Chai - Ta Van
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Met up at your hotel in Sapa with a local guide and driver for a short transfer to Cat Cat village. After a couple of minutes, you follow the steps going downhill to Cat Cat village. You will stop by a waterfall and a hydroelectric station for a while before continuing the trek on a dirt trail through rice paddy terraces. You will also enjoy spectacular scenery while walking along a narrow river. You eventually arrive in Y Linh Ho village of the Black Hmong minority, where you can take a rest while you are served lunch near the river. After lunch, you head toward Muong Hoa valley. You will pass through Lao Chai village of the Black Hmong minority and then Tavan village of the Giay minority by following a very popular trekking route. You will return to Sapa from Tavan by car. Approx: 0,5 hour driving / 5 hours walking / 1 hour lunch. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa - Ha Giang by Bus
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 06:30: Our Limousine bus will pick you up from your hotel in Sapa. 10:30: The bus stops at Tuyen Quang City for a break. 15:00: Arrival in Ha Giang City. Enjoy your lunch at our restaurant. Afterward, our bus will drop you off at the hotel for check-in and rest. 19:00: Enjoy dinner. You'll have some free time to relax. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Ha Giang City - Quan Ba - Dong Van Town Join Group Tour
days.details: Please note that this is group tour with maximum 12 people. 07:00: Have breakfast and check out of your hotel. 07:30: The car/jeep/motorbike and tour guide will pick you up. Embark on a sightseeing trip to Ha Giang Loop: Bac Sum Pass, Heaven's Gate Quan Ba, Can Ty Pass. 12:30: Enjoy a delightful local lunch in the charming town of Yen Minh before continuing your trip. Tham Ma pass, Sung La Valley and Lung Cam Village, Hmong King's Palace. 16:30: Arrive in Dong Van town and check into the hotel. 19:30: Ẹnjoy dinner at the Old Quarter, followed by a leisurely walk. Overnight in Dong Van.

days.title: Dong Van - Lung Cu - Meo Vac Join Group Tour
days.details: Please note that this is group tour with maximum 12 people. 07:00: Enjoy breakfast and check out of the hotel. We'll head to Lung Cu, with several fascinating points to visit: Lung Cu flag pole, Lo Lo Chai village, Ma Le Village. 12:30: Return to Dong Van town for a delicious lunch. Then, we'll continue our journey on the road with a special name, 'Happiness' - to visit: Ma Pi Leng Pass, Nho Que River, Meo Vac town. 16:30: Arrive in Meo Vac town. Check in the hotel and relax. 19:00: Enjoy a delicious dinner prepared by the host family and spend the evening relaxing or interacting with the locals. Overnight in Meo Vac.

days.title: Meo Vac/ Lung Cu - Ha Giang City - Ha Noi Join Group Tour
days.details: Please note that this is group tour with maximum 12 people. 07:00: Enjoy breakfast, check out homestay and come back to Ha Giang City. Along the way, you'll have the opportunity to visit: Meo Vac town, Lung Tam village, Nam Dam village. 13:00: Enjoy lunch in Quan Ba town. 15:30: Arrive at the Rocks Ha Giang Restaurant and enjoy Tea Break Time with a welcome drink and fruit. 16:00: Our comfortable Limousine bus will pick you up for the return trip to Hanoi. 22:00: Arrive in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. 08:00 – 08:30: Pick up at hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15 Check in aboard with a welcome drink from a crew member while the manager introduces the safety briefing and the boat cruises to the Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15 Let your vacation start with a delicious lunch in the restaurant. 15:30 Discover Thien Canh Son cave, located on top of the mountain, containing a long history of geological value and natural beauty. Recommend you bring the camera and wear sports shoes for hiking. 17:30 Enjoy your time with the beautiful sunset on the bay and join 'Happy Hour'. 18:00 Cooking class on sundeck with the Deep Fried Spring rolls, one of the unique flavors of Vietnamese food. 19:30 Dinner will be served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 21:00 Feel free to relax on the boat, join Squid fishing at the area of the Reception deck. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi - Fly to Da Nang - Hoi An by Private Car
days.details: 06:30 Start your day with Taichi on the sundeck. 07:00 Light breakfast served in the dining room. 07:45 Visiting Vung Vieng floating fishing village, one of the biggest villages in HaLong Bay, you will have the chance to learn about fishermen's living and feel free with some option activities: bamboo boat or kayaking. 09:00 Back to the main boat for relaxing and check out at the reception, please put all your luggage at the outside of your cabin door, crew member will help to bring luggage on land. 09:45 Brunch is served in the restaurant while the boat heads back to the harbor. 11:00 Disembark at the harbor. Transfer to Ha Noi city. (around 3 hours). The Limousine bus will drop you off at Aeon Mall Long Bien, where our driver is waiting for you, then continue to transfer you to Noi Bai airport for your flight to Da Nang. Upon landing at Da Nang International Airport, retrieve your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look out for our driver, who will be holding a sign with your name on it. In case of any difficulty finding him, you're welcome to reach out to us via call or WhatsApp (+84) 888 242 848 for immediate assistance. We will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in Hoi An Ancient Town. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour Half Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, start your exploration of Hoi An Ancient Town, a well-preserved UNESCO World Heritage site. Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House, which offers a glimpse into the architecture and cultural fusion of this former trading port. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall, known for its intricate architecture and cultural significance. Next to visit The Japanese Covered Bridge. It is an iconic symbol of the ancient town, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The tour will also take you through the vibrant local market where you can see the colorful array of goods being sold from food to fabrics. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market, where you can see a colorful array of goods being sold, from food to fabrics.. Return to your hotel, with the rest of the day at your disposal to relax or explore more of the city. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Tra Que Village & Basket Boat Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. At 8:00 AM, begin your day in Hoi An with a hotel pick-up and towards the serene Cam Thanh region. Your first adventure is a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest, where you'll navigate the calm waterways, enveloped by lush mangroves and towering palms, offering a tranquil start to your day. Following your exploration of the waterways, continue to the aromatic Tra Que Vegetable Village, where a delightful lunch awaits. Savor the flavors of local dishes prepared with fresh, organic produce from the surrounding gardens, offering a true taste of the region's culinary heritage. Post-lunch, take the opportunity to explore Tra Que Village further. Immerse yourself in the daily life and traditional farming practices of this vibrant community, surrounded by lush herb gardens and verdant fields. Conclude your day with a leisurely transfer back to your hotel, carrying with you the memories and serene experiences of Hoi An's natural beauty and rich cultural tapestry. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Da Nang - Fly to Ho Chi Minh - Food Tour by Vespa Scooter
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. A car will pick you up and drive you to Danang Airport. Fly to Ho Chi Minh City. When you arrive at Tan Son Nhat Airport, a car will take you to your hotel in the city center. Move smoothly from the calm streets of Hoi An to the lively Ho Chi Minh City, ready for a new experience. 'A foodie night out on the town' - Experience the local nightlife and enjoy tasty food and live music as we ride pillion on vintage Vespas along the busy streets of this vibrant city. See Saigon come alive at night on this after dark adventure! Description: Immerse yourself in the cosmopolitan nightlife of this busy city by night. Soak up the energy of this urban metropolis at a top-ranking stylish venue of Saigon in the central city location, where we sip on our first drinks and try out some tasty snacks while watching the sunset in Saigon. Your expert driver will then zoom through the busy streets of Saigon as you check out some of the famous highlights in this bustling city. Feel like a local as we feast on authentic, fresh seafood dishes, eating streetside, and then enjoy the local favourite that is the delicious Banh Xeo, a traditional Vietnamese savoury pancake. We then ride off into the night again to experience live music at a live music venue where a new generation of Vietnamese flaunts their style. Bring a healthy appetite and a sense of adventure as our guides show you their city by night. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City Full Day
days.details: Have Breakfast at your hotel. At 8.00 AM : Our Guide and car will meet you at your hotel in HCM city center and start the tour to explore HCM city. The first place to visit in the tour will be the Reunification Palace, which was the former residence of the President of South Vietnam until end of the war in April 1975 . After Reunification Palace, you can walk to see some French colonial structures including Notre Dame Cathedral, the Old Central Post Office. Continue on to Chinatown, Thien Hau pagodas, which is dedicated to the Goddess of the Sea. Explore the highlights of this fascinating area, beginning with intricate friezes, carved tableau and impressive incense coils make for some great photos. Then observe street life through the narrow streets to Binh Tay market that sells everything from clothes to dried squid. Have Lunch at a local restaurant. Then continue to visit the War Remnants Museum, where there is a vast display of the Indochina wars. In the courtyard, massive military vehicles are for exhibition as well as tiger cages for the visitor to get a feel of what it was to be a prisoner during wartime. In the museum building itself, each floor will represent a separate theme from the war and the war crimes committed against the Vietnamese people. We end the city tour with Ben Thanh market, where anything and everything is for sale. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Mui Ne by Private Car
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Take a transfer to Mui Ne by private car a coastal town in Vietnam, is renowned for its stunning beaches, unique sand dunes, and vibrant kite surfing scene. Check in to your hotel in Mui Ne for relaxation. Overnight in Mui Ne.

days.title: Mui Ne Sand Dunes Jeep Tour
days.details: You can choose 2 options (Sunrise or Sunset) as below: Option 1: Sunrise program (04:30 AM - 09:00 AM) - 04:30 AM: Pick-up from your hotel to Pick up point and start your tour to the White Sand Dunes to catch the stunning sunrise. The golden sands provide the perfect backdrop for photos. Quad-biking over the dunes. ( with driver). 06:15 AM: Visit the Red Sand Dunes, with their vibrant red hues and gentle slopes make this location ideal for photography. Try sandboarding for a fun experience. 07:00 AM: Visit Fishing Village to experience local cultures as you watch fishermen unload their morning catch. Admire the colorful fishing boats anchored along the shore. 07:30 AM: Visit Fairy Stream. Leave your shoes at the rack and wade through the cool, ankle-deep water, surrounded by colorful sand formations. Optional: Ostrich riding (additional charge). 09:00 AM: Return to your hotel. Option 2: Sunset program (12:45 PM - 06:00 PM) - 12:45 PM: Pick up from our Mui Ne Office and head to the Fairy Stream. 13:15 PM: Visit Fairy Stream. Leave your shoes at the rack and wade through cool, ankle-deep water, surrounded by colorful sand formations. *Optional: Ostrich riding (additional charge). 14:45 PM: Explore the fishing village and observe the daily lives of local fishermen. 15:45 PM: Visit the White Sand Dunes. Quad-biking over the dunes. ( with Driver). 17:00 PM: Visit the Red Sand Dunes for Stunning sunset Views. The Gentle Slopes and vivid red sand provide perfect photography opportunities. 18:00 PM: Return to your hotel. WHAT TO BRING: Hat and Sunscreen, Camera, Sandals or flip-flops, Sunglasses. Overnight in Mui Ne.

days.title: Mui Ne - Ho Chi Minh
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Depart Mui Ne for Ho Chi Minh by Private Car. Take a leisurely stroll around the Old Quarter, soaking in the bustling atmosphere and vibrant street life. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh Departure
days.details: Breakfast at your Hotel. You have free time until your driver arrives to pick you up from your hotel to take you to the airport for your onward flight.
