days.title: Ho Chi Minh Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Tan Son Nhat International Airport. Meet guide/driver (sign with your name). Transfer to hotel in central Ho Chi Minh City. Free time for relaxation or independent exploration. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Mui Ne
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Free morning for leisure. Private car transfer to Mui Ne. Overnight in Mui Ne.

days.title: Mui Ne Sand Dunes Tour by Jeep
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Free morning for leisure. 12:00 PM: Driver pick-up for afternoon tour. 12:45 PM: Depart from Mui Ne office to Fairy Stream. 13:15 PM: Visit Fairy Stream (colorful sand formations, optional ostrich riding). 14:45 PM: Explore the fishing village. 15:45 PM: Visit the White Sand Dunes (optional quad-biking). 17:00 PM: Visit the Red Sand Dunes for sunset views. 18:00 PM: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Mui Ne.

days.title: Mui Ne - Da Lat Transfer
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel in Mui Ne. Free morning for your own activities. Around 12:00 PM, private car pick-up for transfer to Da Lat. Check in to your hotel in Da Lat and overnight stay. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat City Tour
days.details: 8:00 AM: Visit Bao Dai Summer Palace (historical residence of the last Emperor). Explore Robin Hill & take the Cable Car (panoramic views of Da Lat & Paradise Lake). Visit Truc Lam Zen Monastery (largest Zen university, beautiful gardens). See Datanla Waterfall (optional roller coaster or walk). Visit Van Hanh Pagoda (giant golden Sakyamuni Buddha statue). Visit Da Lat Cathedral Church (bronze rooster, European Gothic architecture). Explore Da Lat Flower Park (diverse flowers, bonsai, lakeside activities). Enjoy lunch during the tour. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat - Nha Trang
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel in Da Lat. Free morning for leisure. Around 12:00 PM, private car pick-up for transfer to Nha Trang. Check in to your hotel in Nha Trang and overnight stay. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang City & Mud Spa Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 8:30 AM: Pick-up by driver and tour guide for city tour. Visit the Vietnam Oceanographic Institute (sea creature collection). Explore Long Son Pagoda, Nha Trang Cathedral (Stone Church), and Chong Promontory Rocks. Enjoy lunch during the tour. Visit the Cham Po Nagar Temples (Cham Culture vestige). Relax and enjoy mud bathing and mineral springs swimming at Thap Ba Hot Spring Mud Center. Return to your hotel, observing local Nha Trang life along the way. Tour ends around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang - Da Nang - Hoi An
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Transfer to Nha Trang airport for your flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival at Da Nang airport, transfer to your hotel in Hoi An. Check in and overnight in Hoi An. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Tra Que - Basket Boat - Walking Tour Full Day
days.details: 9:00 AM: Hotel pick-up and transfer to Cam Thanh region. Enjoy a bamboo basket boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Continue to Tra Que Vegetable Village for a local lunch. Explore Tra Que Village and its traditional farming practices. 2:00 PM: Begin walking tour of Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site). Visit Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Optional: Rooftop café visit or lantern-making workshop. Return to your hotel, free time for relaxation or further exploration. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Da Nang - Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a full-day trip to Ba Na Hills. Experience four seasons in one day and various festivals. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car (panoramic mountain views). Visit the Golden Bridge (iconic pedestrian bridge held by giant stone hands). Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy Fantasy Park (indoor amusement park). Have a buffet lunch at Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village (replica of classical French architecture). Return to your hotel in Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Da Nang City Full Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by tour guide and car for a full-day Da Nang exploration. Visit Marble Mountain (pagodas, caves, panoramic views from Thuy Son summit). Explore Son Tra Peninsula (stunning views, visit the iconic 67m Lady Buddha statue). Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the Cham Museum (largest collection of Cham artifacts). See the Dragon Bridge and explore the vibrant Han Market (souvenirs, local snacks). Return to your hotel in Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Da Nang - Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Transfer to Da Nang Airport for your flight to Hanoi. Upon arrival at Noi Bai International Airport, transfer to your hotel in Hanoi. Check in and overnight in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi City Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by tour guide for a full-day Hanoi exploration. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, Stilt House - modest dress required, Mausoleum closures noted). See the One Pillar Pagoda. Visit the Temple of Literature (historical and architectural significance). Enjoy a local lunch. Afternoon options: Ethnology Museum (if open) or Women's Museum (if Ethnology Museum closed). Experience Hanoi Train Street and the Old Quarter, including Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Return to your hotel around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Bai Dinh - Trang An - Mua Cave Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Car pick-up for a trip to Ninh Binh. Visit Bai Dinh Pagoda (largest Buddhist complex in Vietnam). Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Explore the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex with a mesmerizing boat ride through limestone karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (climb almost 500 steps for panoramic views of Tam Coc). Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 08:00 – 08:30: Shuttle bus pick-up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15: Check-in aboard with welcome drink and safety briefing as the boat cruises to Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15: Enjoy lunch in the restaurant. 15:30: Explore Thien Canh Son cave (hiking, bring camera and sports shoes). 17:30: Enjoy sunset on the bay and 'Happy Hour'. 18:00: Cooking class on the sundeck (Deep-Fried Spring rolls). 19:30: Dinner served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 21:00: Relax on the boat or join squid fishing. Overnight on the cruise in Ha Long Bay. Overnight in Ha Long Bay.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi
days.details: 06:30: Start the day with Tai Chi on the sundeck. 07:00: Light breakfast served in the dining room. 07:45: Visit Vung Vieng floating fishing village (learn about fishermen's lives, optional bamboo boat or kayaking). 09:00: Return to the main boat for relaxation and check-out. Please leave luggage outside cabin door. 09:45: Brunch is served in the restaurant while the boat returns to the harbor. 11:00: Disembark at the harbor. Transfer back to Hanoi city. Check in to your hotel in Hanoi and overnight stay. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Sa Pa by Limousine Bus
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 7:00 - 15:00: Transfer to Sapa by limousine bus. Check in to your hotel in Sapa. Free time to relax in Sapa. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa - Cat Cat - Y Linh Ho - Lao Chai - Tavan
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM: Meet local guide and driver at your hotel for a short transfer to Cat Cat village. Trek downhill to Cat Cat village, stopping at a waterfall and hydroelectric station. Continue trekking on a dirt trail through rice paddy terraces and along a narrow river. Arrive in Y Linh Ho village (Black Hmong minority) for a rest and riverside lunch. Trek through Muong Hoa valley, passing Lao Chai village (Black Hmong) and Tavan village (Giay minority). Return to Sapa from Tavan by car (approx. 0.5 hour drive). Approx. 5 hours of walking. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Fansipan Half Day - Ha Noi
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up by your guide for the Fansipan excursion. Board the world's longest non-stop three-rope cable car to Fansipan summit. Enjoy panoramic views, explore temples and statues at Indochina's highest point. Enjoy lunch during your visit to Fansipan. Return to the base and transfer back to your hotel. 2:00 PM: Limousine bus pick-up for transfer to Hanoi (15:00 - 21:00). Check in to your hotel in Hanoi and overnight stay. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Departure from Hanoi
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Free time until your scheduled airport transfer. Private car will pick you up from your hotel to transfer you to Noi Bai International Airport for your onward flight.

21.name: Private Vietnam 21 Days 20 Nights - With Join Group Day Tours at Destination (Detailed)

days.title: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Arrival
days.details: Welcome to Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam! Upon landing at Tan Son Nhat International Airport, retrieve your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look out for our guide or driver, who will be holding a sign with your name on it. We will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in central Ho Chi Minh. After checking in, the remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the vibrant city. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City Full Day
days.details: GROUP SIZE: 12 people. PICK UP: 07:30 – 08:00 (exact time depends on accommodation). RETURN: 18:00 pm. Visit Independence Palace, Notre Dame Cathedral, and Central Post Office (French Colonial architecture). Explore the War Remnants Museum. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Discover Cho Lon (Big Market) and Thien Hau Pagoda in Chinatown. Experience a Saigon River waterbus tour, offering unique views of landmarks like Landmark 81 and Bitexco Financial Tower. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Mekong Delta Full Day
days.details: GROUP SIZE: 12 people. PICK UP: 07:30 – 08:00 (exact time depends on accommodation). RETURN: 17:30 pm. Travel from Ho Chi Minh City to My Tho, a town on the Mekong River. Visit Vinh Trang Pagoda, dating back to the late 19th century. Enjoy a sampan cruise around the four beautiful islands: Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, and Tortoise. Stop at Unicorn Island to walk through country lanes, see orchards, enjoy tropical fruits, and listen to local folk music. Visit a fruit plantation, a honey-bee farm (and enjoy honey tea), and a coconut candy workshop. Experience a hand-rowed sampan ride through Thoi Son canal, enjoying the countryside beauty. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Cycle around Tan Thach village to experience local daily life in the Mekong Delta; hammocks are available for relaxation. Return to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Cu Chi Tunnels Half Day Tour
days.details: GROUP SIZE: 12 pax. PICK UP OPTIONS: Morning: 07:30 am – 08:00 am (depending on accommodation) or Afternoon: 12:30 pm – 13:00 pm (depending on accommodation). RETURN: 14:30 pm (morning tour) / 19:30 pm (afternoon tour). Travel to Cu Chi Tunnels, located 70 km northwest of Ho Chi Minh City, known as an 'area of steel' during wartime with over 200km of tunnels. Watch an introductory video about the tunnels' construction and wartime survival. Explore the extensive tunnel systems, including living areas (kitchens, bedrooms), martial facilities (storage, weapon factories, field hospitals, command centers), and hidden traps. Enjoy special tea and cassava (guerrilla's food during the war). Optional: Opportunity to try real shooting guns (at own expense). Return to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Fly to Danang - Hoi An
days.details: The car will pick you up at the airport. Welcome to Da Nang, Vietnam! Upon landing at Da Nang Airport, retrieve your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look out for our guide or driver, who will be holding a sign with your name on it. We will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in Hoi An. After checking in, the remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the vibrant city. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An City Tour – Boat Ride – Release Flower Lantern
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Afternoon Exploration (starting around 2:30 PM): Meet your guide at your Hoi An hotel. Visit the vibrant Hoi An Market. Explore the colorful Phuc Kien Chinese Assembly Hall. Discover remarkably well-preserved old houses like Phung Hung Ancient House or Tan Ky Ancient House. Visit the Museum of Folk Culture and enjoy art shows at the Traditional Performing Arts House. Make a stop at the iconic Japanese Bridge. Explore local handicraft shops and artwork galleries, and discover charming smaller laneways. Enjoy dinner with Hoi An specialty food. Experience a relaxing boat ride on the river and participate in the beautiful flower lantern release. Tour concludes around 6:30 PM, with return to your hotel by 7:00 PM. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Tra Que Vegetable Village - Cooking Class
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:45 - 9:00 am: A local guide will meet you at your hotel and provide a bicycle ride to the local market, where you'll learn about vegetables' uses in food and medicine. Passing through small roads, rice fields, and taking pictures of buffaloes, cows, or farmers working daily. Explore many beautiful views of the Hoi An countryside and meet many warm-hearted and lovely farmers. Then, visit Tra Que Vegetable Village, a traditional craft village. 10:15 am: At the Tra Que village, you will have a chance to enjoy É Water, a health-promoting tea made from garden herbs. Wear a farmer's uniform and a conical hat, and experience growing organic vegetables from ancient times. 10:50 am: Returning to the people's house, you will have your head, shoulders, and feet massaged with herbs from the garden. 11:30 am: After a relaxing massage, you'll prepare for a cooking class, learning how to make flowers from vegetables such as carrots, tomatoes, and spring onions. Then you will start learning five dishes and eating more rice and stir-fried morning glory with garlic. Enjoy your lunch after the cooking class (vegetarian is available if requested). 1:30 pm: Take a rest and return to the hotel on your bike. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Free Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. You have a full free day to discover the city by yourself by walking around or going shopping. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills Full Day - Da Nang
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Morning pick-up (07:30 - 08:00 AM) from your hotel lobby, then transfer to Ba Na Hills via a modern Cable Car. Explore top attractions including the Golden Bridge, Le Jardin D'amourn (nine gardens), and Linh Ung Pagoda. Take another cable car ride to the French Village, enjoying street music, art displays, and carnival performances. Savor a buffet lunch at a local restaurant. Experience the Lava Train to discover new check-in spots like Helios waterfall and Time Gate, then delve into Fantasy Park with its diverse array of games and rides, including Fairy Forest, Dinosaur Park, and various 5D, 4D, and 3D experiences. Return (3:00 - 5:45 PM) to the cable car for departure from Ba Na Hills, with a minivan transfer back to your hotel in Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Marble Mountains - Monkey Mountain – Am Phu Cave Morning Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Our van will pick you up at 8:30 AM to transfer you to Monkey Mountain, where you'll admire the giant Lady Buddha statue and its scenic surroundings. From 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM, discover the Marble Mountains, including local stone sculpture factories. Climb to the top (elevator optional) to explore beautiful 19th-century pagodas and visit Huyền Không or Tàng Chơn Caves. Continue to the fascinating Âm Phủ Cave to learn about Buddhist philosophies and capture amazing photos. Enjoy lunch at 11:45 AM at a local restaurant, savoring authentic Vietnamese cuisine. At 1:00 PM, you will be dropped off at your hotel. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Hue City Explore Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. En route to Hue, stop to visit scenic attractions: Hai Van Pass, a 21km mountain pass offering stunning views and forming the natural border between Thua Thien Hue Province and Da Nang City. Lap An Lagoon and Lang Co Beach, a more than 10km long white sand beach with blue waters, ideal for relaxing and photos. At 10:45 AM, visit the Khai Dinh Tomb, known for its unique blend of Eastern and Western architectural designs. At 12:00 PM, enjoy a delightful lunch featuring authentic Hue cuisine at a beautiful local restaurant, followed by a rest. At 1:00 PM, continue your tour by visiting Hue Imperial City, the former palace of 13 Nguyen Kings, including iconic sites like Ngo Mon Gate, the Library, Thai Hoa Palace, and the Nine Dynastic Urns. At 3:00 PM, visit Thien Mu Pagoda, a significant site deeply intertwined with Hue's culture and history. At 3:45 PM, begin your journey back to Da Nang. At 6:00 PM, you will be dropped off at your hotel in Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Da Nang - Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. When it's time, a car will pick you up from your hotel for your transfer to Da Nang airport. Take off on a 1-hour flight to Hanoi. Upon landing, a vehicle will be ready to transfer you to your hotel in Hanoi for check-in. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi City Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Begin your Hanoi City exploration with a pick-up between 8:00 AM and 8:30 AM. Visit Tran Quoc Pagoda, the oldest pagoda in Hanoi, located on Golden Fish Island in West Lake. Explore the Ho Chi Minh Complex, which includes seeing the embalmed body of Ho Chi Minh, his former residences, and the unique One Pillar Pagoda (note: dress modestly; mausoleum closed on Mondays and Fridays, and for annual maintenance from June 15 - August 15). Continue to the Vietnam Ethnology Museum to learn about the diverse cultures of Vietnam's 54 ethnic groups (Note: if closed on Mondays, the Women's Museum will be visited). Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant, sampling 8 delicious Vietnamese dishes. In the afternoon, visit the Temple of Literature, Vietnam's first university established in the 11th century. Conclude your tour at the Hoa Lo Prison Museum (known as the 'Hanoi Hilton'), which served as a prison during French colonial times and the Vietnam War. The tour finishes between 4:15 PM and 4:30 PM, with transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Bai Dinh – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Between 7:00 AM and 7:50 AM, your tour guide and driver will pick you up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter for transfer to Ninh Binh. Enjoy a 15-20 minute short break en route. At 10:30 AM, arrive at Bai Dinh Pagoda, one of Vietnam's most famous pagodas, known for its records including 500-stone Arhat statues, a 27-ton bell tower, and a 36-ton bronze bell, and a golden statue of the Goddess of Mercy. At 12:00 PM, enjoy lunch featuring Ninh Binh specialties (vegetarian options available) at the Trang An Eco Holiday Retreat. From 1:15 PM - 1:30 PM, begin your visit to Trang An, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Enjoy a 1.5-hour boat ride through its beautiful tunnel cave system, famous as a filming location for 'Kong: Skull Island.' At 3:30 PM, proceed to Mua Cave. Climb 500 steps to the mountain's peak for stunning panoramic views of the city and Tam Coc. At 5:00 PM, begin your transfer back to Hanoi. You will be dropped off at your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter between 7:00 PM and 7:30 PM. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi – Sapa – Cat Cat Village
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel and check out early. 06h00 – 06h30 Sleeping bus will pick you up at Hanoi Old Quarter. After 05 hours on the highway, the car will take you to Sapa resort. 13h00 – 13h30 You go to the hotel, check in at the hotel and have lunch at the restaurant. 14h00 – 14h30 Tour guide and guests walk to visit Cat Cat village, start the journey to discover the village Visit Cat Cat - Sin Chai village of the H'mong. Visitors will be able to visit and learn about the customs and habits of ethnic minorities. Visit Cat Cat waterfall and hydroelectric power plant built by the French in the early 20th century, have fun and take souvenir photos… 18h00 – 18h30 Have dinner at the restaurant. Sleeping at a hotel. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa Trekking - Y Linh Ho - Lao Chai - Ta Van
days.details: 07h00 – 08h00 Having breakfast at the restaurant. Check-out procedure at hotel. You will store your luggage at the lounge of hotel, only bring small bag with important thing. 08h00 – 08h30 Trekking to Y Linh Ho village and then start hiking through the rice terraces along Muong Hoa Stream to Lao Chai, the village of Black H'mong minority. Here you will enjoy the spectacular landscape of Hoang Lien Son mountain ranges. 12h00 -12h30 Having lunch at Ta Van village then check-in and rest. 13h30 – 14h00 Comeback to homestay and rest. Then prepare to learn how to cook some local dishes. 18h30 Enjoy dinner with the dishes you have made. Overnight at homestay in Ta Van village. Overnight in Ta Van Village.

days.title: Ta Van – Giang Ta Chai Village - Supan- Sapa - Hanoi
days.details: At 7:00 AM, have breakfast at your homestay. Between 8:00 AM and 8:30 AM, begin an 8 km walk to visit Giang Ta Chai Village and Supan Village, both belonging to the Red Dao ethnic group. Giang Ta Chai is particularly known for its colorful traditions and customs. At 12:00 PM, enjoy lunch and rest at the homestay. At 2:00 PM, a car will pick you up for transfer back to Sapa. At 3:30 PM, board a bus for your return journey to Hanoi. At 9:30 PM, arrive in Hanoi (bus drops off at Tran Quang Khai/Ly Thai To Street). A private car will pick you up and transfer you to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi - Halong Bay - Overnight on the Cruise
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel and check out early. 08:00 – 08:30 Shuttle bus pick up at hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15 Check-in aboard with a welcome drink from crew member while the manager introduces the safety briefing and the boat cruises to the Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15 Let your vacation start with a delicious lunch in the restaurant. 15:30 Discover Thien Canh Son cave located on top of mountain, containing the long history of geological value and natural beauty. Recommend you bring camera and wear sport shoes for hiking. 17:30 Enjoy your time with the beautiful sunset on the bay and join 'Happy Hour'. 18:00 Cooking class on sundeck with the Deep Fried Spring rolls, one of the unique flavor of Vietnamese food. 19:30 Dinner will be served on sundeck or restaurant. 21:00 Feel free to relax on boat, join Squid fishing at the area of Reception deck. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Halong Bay - Hanoi
days.details: At 6:00 AM, start your day with a Tai Chi session on the sundeck or enjoy the morning view of the bay's landscape. Coffee will be available around 6:30 AM. At 7:00 AM, a buffet breakfast will be served. At 7:30 AM, explore the well-hidden Thien Canh Son Cave. At 8:30 AM, return to the cruise to pack your luggage and shower. At 9:15 AM, check-out (leave heavy luggage in the corridor, key on the door). At 9:45 AM, prepare a simple Vietnamese dish, fresh spring rolls, with guidance from the crew. At 10:15 AM, enjoy a traditional Vietnamese brunch on the boat. Between 10:45 AM and 11:30 AM, complete payment and debarkation, then wait for the shuttle bus to the port. At 12:00 PM, your bus will take you back to Hanoi. The tour ends between 2:30 PM and 3:00 PM, with drop-off at your preferred location in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. Enjoy your free time in Ha Noi and discover the city by yourself by walking around or go shopping. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Departure from Hanoi
days.details: Breakfast at your Hotel. You have free time until your driver arrives to pick you up from your hotel to take you to the airport for your onward flight.
