days.title: Ho Chi Minh City Arrival
days.details: Welcome to Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam! Upon arrival at Tan Son Nhat International Airport, collect luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look for our guide/driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Ho Chi Minh. Remainder of the day is free for relaxation or independent exploration. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 am: Meet your guide and car at your hotel to begin exploring Ho Chi Minh City. Visit the Reunification Palace, the former residence of the President of South Vietnam. Walk to see French colonial architecture: Notre Dame Cathedral and the Old Central Post Office. Continue to Chinatown and explore Thien Hau Pagoda (Goddess of the Sea). Observe street life and visit Binh Tay Market. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the War Remnants Museum to see displays from the Indochina wars. Explore Ben Thanh Market for shopping. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Mekong Delta Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart Ho Chi Minh City for My Tho, Mekong Delta. Visit the historic Vinh Trang Pagoda. Board a sampan and cruise the Mekong River around Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, and Tortoise Islands. Visit a fishing pen and observe fishing boats and the fishing dock. Cross the river to Ben Tre and explore Xep canals by sampan through coconut and mangrove forests. Visit local houses, see bee farms, enjoy fruits and honey tea, and listen to local music. Ride a moto cart on village paths and visit a coconut candy workshop. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Cross the Mekong River back to My Tho pier. Transfer back to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Cu Chi Tunnels Half Day Tour
days.details: Your guide and driver will pick you up from your hotel. Upon arrival at the Cu Chi Tunnels, watch a documentary film about the history and construction of the tunnels. Explore the intricate three-level tunnel system designed to withstand bomb attacks. Learn about how the tunnel system functioned and sustained the local people. Discover: Hoang Cam's smokeless stove, secret hideouts, fighting bunkers, dangerous booby traps, and a rice paper workshop. Enjoy special tea and cassava (typical guerrilla food). Have free time to relax or try shooting Vietnam War-era weapons (optional). Have lunch at a local restaurant. Transfer back to your hotel at the end of the tour. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Fly to Danang - Hoi An
days.details: 10:00 AM: Car will pick you up from the airport in Ho Chi Minh City for your flight to Da Nang. Welcome to Da Nang, Vietnam! Upon arrival at Da Nang Airport, collect your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look for our guide/driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in Hoi An. Remainder of the day is free for relaxation or independent exploration of Hoi An. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Half Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Begin your exploration of Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Optional: Visit a rooftop café for scenic views or participate in a lantern-making workshop. Return to your hotel, with the rest of the day free for relaxation or further exploration. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Tra Que & Coconut Palm Forest
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up to begin your day in the Cam Thanh region. Experience a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Transfer to Tra Que Vegetable Village for a delightful lunch with fresh, organic local dishes. Explore Tra Que Village, observing daily life and traditional farming practices. Conclude the day with a leisurely bike ride back to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Free Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. You have a full free day to discover Hoi An city at your own pace. Options include walking around the ancient town or going shopping. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills Full Day - Da Nang
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a full-day excursion to Ba Na Hills. Experience four distinct seasons in one day and enjoy festivals, activities, and cuisines. Ascend Ba Na Hills by cable car (world's longest non-stop single-track). Enjoy panoramic mountain views. Visit the famous Golden Bridge supported by giant stone hands. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Head to Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park. Enjoy a buffet lunch at Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village, a replica of classical French architecture. Transfer to your hotel in Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Da Nang City Full Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Your tour guide and car will pick you up for a full-day exploration of Da Nang. Visit Marble Mountain, exploring pagodas, caves, and enjoying panoramic views from the summit of Thuy Son. Continue to Son Tra Peninsula for stunning views and visit the iconic 67-meter-tall Lady Buddha statue. Enjoy breathtaking views of the coastline and city. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the Cham Museum, showcasing the history of the Cham civilization and the world's largest collection of Cham artifacts. See the modern Dragon Bridge and explore the vibrant Han Market. The tour concludes with a drop-off back at your hotel. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Da Nang - Hue City Full Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Your guide will pick you up for a full-day exploration of Hue's historical sites. Visit the Ancient Citadel, exploring grand gates and palaces to learn about Vietnam's royal history. Enjoy a boat ride to Thien Mu Pagoda with spiritual insights and Perfume River views. Have lunch at a restaurant in the city center. Explore Tu Duc Tomb, a masterpiece of Vietnamese architecture. Conclude the day with a visit to Dong Ba Market. Transfer to your hotel in Hue. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue - Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. A car will pick you up from your hotel for transfer to the airport. Take a 1-hour flight to Hanoi. Upon arrival in Hanoi, a vehicle will be waiting to transfer you to your hotel for check-in. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi City Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Your tour guide will pick you up for a full-day exploration of Hanoi. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, Stilt House - dress modestly). See the unique One Pillar Pagoda. Visit the Temple of Literature. Enjoy a local lunch. Alternative (if Ethnology Museum is closed): Visit the Women's Museum. Experience Hanoi Train Street and the Old Quarter. Visit Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Hoa Lu – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Your guide and driver will pick you up for a journey to Ninh Binh. Visit Hoa Lu, the ancient capital, and explore the Dinh and Le Temples. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex and enjoy a mesmerizing boat ride through limestone karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave) and climb almost 500 steps to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Sa Pa by Limousine Bus
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel and check out early. Around 6:30 - 7:00 AM, our limousine bus will pick you up at the hotel for transfer to Sapa. Overnight in Sapa. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa Trekking - Y Linh Ho - Lao Chai - Ta Van
days.details: After breakfast, start the tour at 8:30 AM. Meet your local guide at your hotel in Sapa. Stop by a waterfall and a hydroelectric station. Trek on a dirt trail through rice paddy terraces. Enjoy spectacular scenery while walking along a narrow river. Arrive in Y Linh Ho village (Black Hmong minority) for a rest and lunch near the river. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Trek through Muong Hoa valley, passing Lao Chai village (Black Hmong minority) and Tavan village (Giay minority). Return to Sapa from Ta Van by car. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa - Fansipan Peak - Hanoi by Limousine Bus
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel and check out (pack all luggage and leave it with the receptionist). 8:30 AM: Your guide will pick you up for transfer to Muong Hoa cable car station to begin the tour to Fansipan. Enjoy a scenic cable car ride to the summit of Fansipan, the highest peak in Indochina, for breathtaking panoramic views. Descend by cable car and return to your hotel. Have a buffet lunch. 2:00 PM: Return to the hotel to collect your luggage. 3:00 PM: The shuttle bus will pick you up from the hotel for transfer back to Hanoi. Arrive in Hanoi around 9:00 PM. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi - Halong Bay - Overnight on the Cruise
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel in Hanoi. 08:30 – 09:00 AM: Shuttle bus pick-up from your hotel in Hanoi. 12:00 PM: Arrive at Halong International Cruise Port office, wait for registration, and transfer by tender to the cruise. 12:30 PM: Embark on the cruise, enjoy welcome drinks and a tour briefing. 1:00 PM: Enjoy a delicious Vietnamese lunch while cruising into Bai Tu Long Bay. 3:00 PM: Arrive at Cap La Island for kayaking amongst karst formations and swimming/relaxing on a natural beach (tender boat option available). 5:00 PM: Return to the boat and relax. 6:00 PM: Sunset party with music, happy hour, and a vegetable carving demonstration by the chef. 7:00 PM: Enjoy a sumptuous dinner onboard. 8:30 PM: Free time for Vietnamese puzzle games, board games, squid fishing, or enjoying cocktails on the bay. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Halong Bay - Hanoi
days.details: 06:00 AM: Start your day with Tai Chi on the sundeck or enjoy the morning view of Ha Long Bay. Coffee is available around 06:30 AM. 07:00 AM: Buffet breakfast will be served. 07:30 AM: Explore the well-hidden Thien Canh Son Cave. 08:30 AM: Return to the cruise for packing and showering. 09:15 AM: Check-out (leave heavy luggage in the corridor and key on the door). 09:45 AM: Participate in a fresh spring roll making demonstration. 10:15 AM: Enjoy a traditional Vietnamese brunch on the boat. 10:45 - 11:30 AM: Payment and debarkation. Return to the port and wait for the shuttle bus. 12:00 PM: Our bus will take you back to Hanoi. 14:30 – 15:00 PM: End of tour, drop-off at your preferred location in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Incense Village
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. Your guide will pick you up for a half-day tour to Quang Phu Cau Incense Village. Upon arrival, take a walking tour around the village to see the incense-making process (bamboo chopping, dyeing, paste creation, drying). Talk to locals to learn about the history of incense making in the village. Enjoy free time to walk around and take photos of incense bundles and the making process. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Departure from Hanoi
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time until your driver arrives to pick you up from your hotel for transfer to the airport for your onward flight.

22.name: Private Vietnam 22 Days 21 Nights- Vietnam Panorama (Detailed)

days.title: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN) in Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon). Meet your private guide and driver for a transfer to your hotel in the city center. Enjoy free time to relax and settle in after your journey. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh City.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Explore Ho Chi Minh City landmarks: Independence Palace, Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office, and War Remnants Museum. Enjoy local Vietnamese cuisine for lunch. Discover the Cu Chi Tunnels: watch an introductory video and explore the underground network, including living areas and wartime facilities. See hidden traps and taste tea and cassava (guerilla food). Option to experience shooting. Return to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Cai Be - Floating Market – Cu Lao An Binh - Vinh Long
days.details: Depart for Cai Be and take a boat trip to visit the vibrant Cai Be Floating Market. Explore local traditional craft villages (rice paper, candy, green rice, longan drying). Visit a honey tea spot in a fruit garden and learn about beekeeping. Cruise along the Tien River to Tan Phong Islet. Enjoy a rowing boat trip on a small canal and walk through a fruit garden, tasting fresh fruits. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Disembark at Vinh Long Wharf and transfer back to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City, with a view of the My Thuan Suspension Bridge en route. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Cat Tien National Park
days.details: Early morning departure for Cat Tien National Park (approx. 3.5-hour drive with a stop). Explore the rainforest on foot, visiting the Giant Tung Tree, Ben Cu Rapids, and other notable trees. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the Nature Museum and Animal Rescue Center. Alternative: Optional bike ride through Nam Cat Tien village. Late afternoon return to Ho Chi Minh City (approx. 8:00 PM arrival). Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Fly to Da Lat - Waterfalls Tour
days.details: Transfer to the airport for a morning flight to Da Lat. Upon arrival in Da Lat, meet your driver and guide for a sightseeing tour. Visit DATANLA WATERFALL, with an option for a roller coaster ride or walk down. Explore Chicken Village, known for its large concrete chicken and local weaving. See a black pepper farm. Visit POUNGOUR WATERFALL, a majestic and wide waterfall in the Central Highlands. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Experience the impressive Elephant Waterfall and the windy Wind Cave. Visit the biggest temple in the area, featuring large Buddha statues. Learn about silk production at a traditional silk making factory. Transfer to your hotel in Da Lat for check-in around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat – Natural Countryside Landscapes
days.details: After breakfast, depart for Cu Lan Village, set within pine forests. Explore the traditional stilt houses and interact with the local community in Cu Lan Village. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. In the afternoon, visit the scenic Golden Valley with its rolling hills. Explore the Domaine de Marie Church, a Gothic-style church. Wander through a colorful flower park. Return to your hotel in Da Lat. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Dalat – Fly to Danang - Hoi An
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel in Da Lat. Transfer to Lien Khuong Airport for a flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival in Da Nang, meet your driver for a transfer to your hotel in Hoi An. The rest of the day is free for your leisure. You can use the hotel's complimentary shuttle to visit the beach. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Basket Boat, Tra Que Village & Ancient Town Tour
days.details: Enjoy a bamboo basket boat trip in the Coconut Palm Forest. Visit Tra Que Vegetable Village and experience local farming. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Explore Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site): Visit Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through Hoi An Market. Optional: Visit a rooftop café or join a lantern-making workshop. Return to your hotel for free time. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Cooking Class & My Son Sanctuary
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Morning: Hoi An Cooking Class: Transfer to Hai Café. Visit Hoi An's vibrant market to see and learn about local ingredients. Take a scenic boat cruise to Red Bridge Cooking School. Explore the school's herb garden. Participate in a hands-on cooking lesson (approx. 2 hours), learning to prepare local dishes and basic food carving. Enjoy the dishes you have cooked for lunch. Relax and use the swimming pool at the cooking school (towels and showers provided). Afternoon: My Son Sanctuary Tour: Transfer to My Son Sanctuary. Discover the ancient Hindu temples of the Champa Kingdom. Enjoy a traditional Cham dance performance. Return to your hotel in Hoi An. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Da Nang - Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Morning: Depart for Ba Na Hills. Experience a cable car ride with panoramic mountain views (world's longest non-stop single-track). Visit the famous Golden Bridge, supported by giant stone hands. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park. Have a buffet lunch at Ba Na Hills. Afternoon: Explore the French Village, a replica of classical French architecture. Return to your hotel in Da Nang. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Da Nang City Half Day Tour
days.details: Visit Marble Mountain: explore pagodas, caves, and enjoy panoramic views. Explore Son Tra Peninsula: see the Lady Buddha statue and enjoy coastal and city views. Discover the Cham Museum and its collection of Cham artifacts. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Return to your hotel in for an afternoon at the beach. Overnight in Da Nang.

days.title: Danang - Hue City Full Day Tour
days.details: Early morning departure from your hotel in Da Nang for a full-day tour of Hue. Visit Minh Mang Tomb, known for its beautiful gardens and imperial architecture. Enjoy lunch at a restaurant in Hue city center. Take a boat ride on the Perfume River to Thien Mu Pagoda, offering scenic views. Explore Tu Duc Tomb, an impressive example of Vietnamese imperial architecture. Transfer to your hotel in Hue in the late afternoon. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue - Phong Nha Cave - Train to Ha Noi
days.details: Early morning departure from Hue to Quang Binh for your Phong Nha adventure. Visit Paradise Cave, Asia's longest dry cave, located in Phong Nha – Ke Bang National Park. Enjoy a golf cart ride through the jungle and a climb to the cave entrance. Spend approximately 2 hours exploring the stunning interior. Have a traditional Vietnamese lunch at a local restaurant in Phong Nha village. After the tour, our guide will take you to have dinner before heading to Dong Hoi Train station to take the train to Ha Noi. Overnight in Train.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Noi Half Day Tour
days.details: Upon arrival at Ha Noi station, our guide will pick you up transfer to a hotel to have rest. Enjoy breakfast at your hotel in Ha Noi (early check in). Afternoon, begin your Hanoi city tour, visiting: The Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum complex and Ba Dinh Square. Ho Chi Minh's Stilt House and the One Pillar Pagoda. The Temple of Literature. The Old Quarter, including Hoan Kiem Lake and Ngoc Son Temple. Transfer to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Bai Dinh - Trang An - Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel in Hanoi. Depart for Ninh Binh. Visit Bai Dinh Pagoda, Vietnam's largest Buddhist complex. Have lunch at a restaurant. Explore the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex with a boat ride through its stunning limestone karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave) and climb to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer to your hotel in Ninh Binh. Overnight in Ninh Binh.

days.title: Ninh Binh - Cuc Phuong National Park - Ha Noi
days.details: Have an early breakfast and check out from your hotel in Ninh Binh. Depart for Cuc Phuong National Park. Visit the Endangered Primate Rescue Center. Have lunch at a local restaurant in Cuc Phuong. Explore the Park Center, visiting the Cave of Early Man (over 7000 years old) and admiring the primary forest with a 1000-year-old tree. Around 5:30 PM, transfer back to Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Giang City (Group Tour)
days.details: 6:30 AM: Pick up by Limousine bus from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 10:30 AM: Stop in Tuyen Quang City for a break. 1:00 PM: Arrive in Ha Giang City for lunch at a local restaurant. Check in to your hotel and rest. 2:30 PM: Guided tour of Ha Giang City, visiting: Km0 square. Nui Cam Mountain viewpoint. Thanh Thuy - China border. Thon Tha and Ha Thanh Villages. 7:00 PM: Enjoy dinner and return to your hotel for free time. Overnight in Dong Van.

days.title: Ha Giang City - Quan Ba - Yen Minh - Dong Van Town (Group Tour)
days.details: 7:00 AM: Breakfast and hotel check-out. 7:30 AM: Pick up by car/jeep/motorbike and tour guide for the Ha Giang Loop sightseeing trip: Heaven's Gate Quan Ba. Can Ty Pass. Tham Ma Pass. Sung La Valley and Lung Cam Village. 12:30 PM: Lunch at a restaurant in Yen Minh. Continue on the Happiness Road to visit: Hmong King's Palace. Lung Cu flag tower. Lo Lo Chai Village. 4:30 PM: Arrive and check in at your hotel (or homestay) in Dong Van Town. 7:00 PM: Dinner in Dong Van Old Quarter, followed by a walk. Overnight in Dong Van.

days.title: Dong Van – Meo Vac (Group Tour)
days.details: 07:00: Enjoy breakfast at the local market and savor coffee. Afterward, head to Meo Vac Town: Ma Pi Leng Pass, Nho Que River, Meo Vac Town, M-shaped curve. 13:00: Enjoy lunch at Yen Minh town. 15:30: Arrive at Rocks Ha Giang Restaurant to relax. Enjoy Tea Break Time with a welcome drink and fruit. 16:00: Transfer to hotel in Ha Giang. Overnight stay in Ha Giang. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Ha Giang - Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel in Ha Giang. Take a limousine bus back to Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Tuan Chau - Ha Long Bay – Lan Ha Bay – Tra Bau
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel in Hanoi. 8:00 AM: Transfer to No 16 Thi Sach, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi. 8:30 - 8:50 AM: Pick up by Limousine bus from No 16 Thi Sach. 12:00 PM: Arrive at Tuan Chau Marina, Quang Ninh, and meet the Mon Cheri Cruise crew. 12:30 PM: Transfer to the Mon Cheri Cruise and receive a itinerary briefing. 1:00 PM: Enjoy a welcome drink and a special lunch while cruising into Lan Ha Bay. 3:30 PM: Visit Tra Bau area, known for its natural beauty. Enjoy kayaking to explore the limestone islands or swim/relax in the Jacuzzi pool. 5:30 - 6:30 PM: Participate in a cooking demonstration of Vietnamese spring rolls or enjoy the sunset over Lan Ha Bay from the top deck (Happy Hour at the bar). 7:30 PM: Enjoy a delicious local dinner. 9:00 - 10:00 PM: Relax with cocktails at the sky bar (surcharge), enjoy spa services (optional), stargaze from the top deck, or try squid fishing. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Lan Ha Bay – Cat Ba Island – Tuan Chau – Ha Noi Departure
days.details: 6:00 AM: Start your day with a Tai Chi session and enjoy the sunrise. 6:45 - 7:15 AM: Enjoy breakfast while the cruise returns to Gia Luan jetty. 7:30 - 9:00 AM: Transfer and tour Trung Trang Cave on Cat Ba Island, one of the island's most impressive caves. 9:30 AM: Return to the main boat and check out of your cabin. Luggage will be collected. Enjoy lunch at the restaurant and settle any bar bills. 10:30 - 11:00 AM: Disembark the Mon Cheri Cruises and transfer back to Tuan Chau Marina. Relax and wait for your luggage. 11:30 - 12:00 PM: Guests are ready for departure from Tuan Chau Marina.

22-culinary.name: Private Vietnam 22 Days - Vietnam Culinary Journey - With Join Group Day Tours at Destination (Detailed)

days.title: Ha Noi Arrival
days.details: Welcome to Hanoi, Vietnam! Upon arrival at Noi Bai International Airport, collect luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look for our guide/driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Hanoi. The remainder of the day is free for relaxation or independent exploration of the vibrant city. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Cooking Class in Ha Noi Culture Food
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Our driver will pick you up to the meeting point. 9:00 AM: Meet your Chef at 60 Phat Loc Street (Hanoi Food Culture Restaurant & Cooking Class). Enjoy a Market Tour with your Chef, learning about Vietnamese ingredients and experiencing daily market life. Opportunity to sample street food at the market (optional). Receive an overview of recipes and ingredients for the cooking class. Transform ingredients into authentic Vietnamese food in the Hanoi Food Culture kitchen. Detailed instructions and recipes will be provided. Enjoy the food you prepared. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi Jeep Food Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Join the Hanoi Jeep Food Tour for a 4-hour adventure combining motorbike travel with local cuisine. Navigate hidden alleyways and meet friendly locals while enjoying authentic Hanoi flavors. Experience the thrill of riding on the back of a motorbike through the bustling city. Witness a train passing by at Train Street while enjoying a coffee. Savor iconic dishes like egg coffee, Banh Mi, and Pho. Learn about the history and preparation of each dish. Taste Pho Cuon, Bun Cha, and street-side fresh seafood. Enjoy finger foods and local desserts, including unique ice creams and brown-sticky rice with yogurt. Conclude the tour with a refreshing glass of Beer Hoi at a local pub. Share experiences and favorite moments with the group. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Mai Chau
days.details: 8:00 AM: Depart Hanoi for Mai Chau (approximately 3.5-hour drive with a break and photo stop). 12:00 PM: Arrive at Mai Chau Ecolodge, enjoy a welcome drink and towel, followed by a delicious meal and free time to explore. 2:00 PM: Check in to your hotel. 2:30 PM: Depart from your hotel. 2:45 PM: Stop at Nhot Village, visit Mr. Diep's Thai stilt house, interact with locals, and discover their traditional culture. Enjoy local fruit and tea, try weaving, embroidering, pounding rice, and making 'Happy Water'. 3:45 PM: Say goodbye to the host and continue cycling to explore beautiful Thai ethnic villages: Chiềng Sại, Cha Long, Văn, Pom Cọong, Lác Village. Get a closer look at daily life and Thai ethnic culture. 5:00 PM: Return to your hotel. Have dinner at the hotel. Overnight in Mai Chau.

days.title: Mai Chau Trekking Half Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Our guide will pick you up from your hotel. Enjoy a 20-minute drive to Na Cut village. Hike to explore small villages of Thai people hidden in the lush bamboo forest. Admire pristine landscapes with tropical forests on Pu Pop Mountain, limestone mountains, and terrace fields with stilt houses. Take short breaks for photos and interacting with local people. Continue trekking on a shaded trail to Cha Long Village, a small authentic village with cassava and corn fields. Overnight in Mai Chau.

days.title: Mai Chau - Ha Noi
days.details: Have breakfast at your homestay and enjoy the cool morning atmosphere of Mai Chau. Have lunch at the hotel in Mai Chau. Depart Mai Chau. Arrive in Hanoi and check in to your hotel. Overnight in Hanoi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel in Hanoi. 08:00 – 08:30 AM: La Regina Classic Cruise picks you up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15 PM: Check-in aboard the cruise with a welcome drink and safety briefing as the boat cruises to Bai Tu Long Bay. 1:15 PM: Enjoy a delicious lunch in the restaurant. 3:30 PM: Discover Thien Canh Son Cave (bring camera and wear sports shoes for hiking). 5:30 PM: Enjoy the sunset on the bay and join 'Happy Hour'. 6:00 PM: Participate in a cooking class on the sundeck, learning to make Deep Fried Spring rolls. 7:30 PM: Dinner will be served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 9:00 PM: Free time to relax on the boat or join squid fishing at the Reception deck area. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Ha Long Bay – Ha Noi – Fly to Hue
days.details: 06:30 AM: Start your day with Tai Chi on the sundeck. 07:00 AM: Light breakfast served in the dining room. 07:45 AM: Visit Vung Vieng floating fishing village by bamboo boat or kayak to learn about fishermen's lives. 09:00 AM: Return to the main boat for relaxing and check-out (leave luggage outside cabin door). 09:45 AM: Brunch is served in the restaurant as the boat returns to the harbor. 11:00 AM: Disembark at the harbor and transfer to Hanoi city. Stop at a meeting point (Aeon Mall Long Bien). A private car will pick you up for transfer to the airport for your flight to Hue. Upon arrival at Phu Bai airport in Hue, collect your luggage and meet our driver for a comfortable transfer to your hotel. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue City Full Day Tour
days.details: Arrival in Hue. Our guide & driver will pick you up from Hue train station (after your flight) to leave luggage and have breakfast before starting to explore Hue. Visit the Ancient Citadel, exploring grand gates and palaces to learn about Vietnam's royal history. Head to Minh Mang Tomb, nestled among gardens and ponds. Enjoy a boat ride to Thien Mu Pagoda with spiritual insights and Perfume River views. Have lunch at a restaurant in the city center. Conclude your day with a visit to Dong Ba Market. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue - Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to relax and explore the city of Hue at your own pace. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue – Marble Mountain - Hoi An by Private Car
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Our driver will pick you up from your hotel. Drive towards the scenic Hai Van Pass for stunning views and photo opportunities. Explore the Marble Mountains, visiting caves, ancient pagodas, and enjoying the views from its peaks. Conclude your travel with a drive to Hoi An and check in to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking – Basket Boat Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Start your exploration of the serene Cam Thanh region with a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Move to Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. Visit the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Streets and Eats of Hoi An by Vespa – Join in Group
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time for relaxation until the evening. Begin your night with a refreshing drink at a lively local bar and an introduction to Hoi An's street food culture. Ride through lantern-lit streets on a Vespa, sampling iconic dishes like Bánh Can and White Rose Dumplings. Enjoy a scenic boat ride to Cam Nam Island. Savor fresh seafood at a hidden local restaurant with ice-cold beer. Tuck into a Vietnamese hot pot, learning the local 'wrap and roll' style. Feast on sizzling barbecue specialties grilled at your table. Explore hidden backstreets and alleyways, experiencing Hoi An's culinary and cultural scene. End the night with a final toast before your Vespa takes you back to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Cooking Class in Hai Cafe – Join in Group
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Our driver will pick you up and transfer you to the meeting point at Hai Scout Café (8:15 AM). Visit Hoi An's colorful main market to experience its sights, sounds, and aromas, and interact with local sellers. Board the Red Bridge boat for a leisurely 25-minute cruise along the Hoi An River to the Red Bridge Cooking School. Explore the cooking school's herb and vegetable garden. Learn about some of Hoi An's and Vietnam's best-known dishes during a 2-hour cooking lesson with demonstrations by the Red Bridge chefs. Receive a brief introduction to Vietnamese food carving (plate decoration). Enjoy eating the dishes you have cooked. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to relax and explore the city of Hoi An at your own pace. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Free Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to relax and explore the city of Hoi An at your own pace. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Fly to Sai Gon
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. A car will pick you up and drive you to Da Nang International Airport for your flight to Ho Chi Minh City. Upon arrival at Tan Son Nhat International Airport in Ho Chi Minh City, a car will take you to your hotel in the city center. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Sai Gon - City & Cu Chi Tunnels
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Our driver and guide will meet you for a 1.5-hour drive to Cu Chi Tunnels. Watch a short introductory video about the tunnels. Explore the remaining area and tunnel systems, including living areas, kitchens, bedrooms, storage, weapon factories, field hospitals, and command centers. See hidden trap doors and dangerous traps. Taste special tea and cassava (guerrilla food during the war). Option to try shooting a real gun (at your own expense). Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit Independence Palace (Reunification Palace). See French Colonial structures: Notre Dame Cathedral and the historic Central Post Office. Visit the War Remnants Museum. Visit Ben Thanh Market. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Sai Gon - Cooking Class Tour
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Our driver will pick you up and transfer you to the meeting point for the cooking class. 8:00 AM: Welcome and introduction by staff and the English-speaking Vietnamese Chef. Accompanied by the instructor, embark on a market tour to explore local ingredients and interact with vendors. Learn to prepare three authentic Vietnamese dishes with hands-on experience and guidance from the Chef. Gain insights into cooking principles, techniques, and the cultural significance of each dish. Enjoy the delicious meal you prepared with other participants. Complimentary desserts are served. Each participant receives a recipe folder to recreate the dishes at home. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Sai Gon – Mekong Tour – Can Tho
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart Ho Chi Minh City for My Tho, Mekong Delta. Begin with a serene visit to the historic Vinh Trang Pagoda. Board a sampan and cruise the Mekong River around Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, and Tortoise Islands. Visit a fishing pen and observe fishing boats and the fishing dock. Cross the river to Ben Tre and continue on Xep canals by hand-rowed sampan through coconut and mangrove forests. Visit local houses, see bee farms, enjoy fruits and honey tea, and listen to local music. Hop on a moto cart on village paths and visit a family coconut candy workshop. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Cross the Mekong River back to My Tho pier and transfer to Can Tho. Overnight in Can Tho.

days.title: Can Tho - Cai Rang Floating Market - Ho Chi Minh
days.details: Begin your day with a visit to explore the Cai Rang floating market, the largest floating market in the Mekong Delta. Witness the bustling trade of fruits and goods from boats and observe the unique river culture. Taste local specialties such as fresh fruits and noodle dishes. Gain an authentic insight into the daily life and traditions of the people in southern Vietnam. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Transfer back to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Sai Gon Departure
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time until you are picked up and transferred to the airport for your onward flight.

23.name: Private Vietnam 23 Days 22 Nights - Major of VietNam Trip (Detailed)

days.title: Ho Chi Minh Arrival
days.details: Welcome to Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam! Arrive at Tan Son Nhat Airport. Our guide will meet you at arrivals (look for your name). Transfer to your central hotel. Free time to relax or explore. Overnight in Saigon.

days.title: Sai Gon City & Cu Chi Tunnel
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart from your HCM city center hotel with your driver and guide. Visit Independence Palace, Notre Dame Cathedral, the historic Central Post Office, and the War Remnants Museum. Around 12:00 PM: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. After lunch, depart for Cu Chi Tunnels (approx. 1.5-hour drive). Watch an introductory video. Explore the tunnel systems (living areas, kitchens, bedrooms, hospitals, etc.), hidden traps. Taste tea and cassava (guerilla food). Option to try shooting. Transfer back to your hotel after visiting the Cu Chi Tunnels. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Mekong Delta Discovery
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart Ho Chi Minh City for My Tho (Mekong River). Visit the historic Vinh Trang Pagoda. Board a sampan and cruise around the four islands (Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, Tortoise). Visit a fishing pen and see fishing boats. Cross to Ben Tre and navigate the Xep canals by hand-rowed sampan through coconut and mangrove landscapes. Visit local houses, see bee farms, enjoy fruits and honey tea, and listen to local music. Ride a moto cart on village paths and visit a coconut candy workshop. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Cross the Mekong River back to My Tho pier. Transfer back to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Sai Gon - Fly to Nha Trang
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. Transfer to the airport for your flight to Nha Trang. Upon arrival at Cam Ranh Airport (Nha Trang), our driver will meet you at arrivals (look for your name). Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your central Nha Trang hotel. Free time to relax or explore Nha Trang's nightlife. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang Free Day
days.details: Have Breakfast at your hotel. Spend this day relaxing or exploring the beautiful beach city. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang - Da Lat by Private Car
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. Travel by bus from Nha Trang to Da Lat, known for its cool climate, pine forests, and charming French colonial architecture. The remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the unique city. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat Countryside Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:30 AM: Visit Van Thanh Flower Village, known for its various blooms since the late 1950s. 9:30 AM: Experience weasel coffee at a plantation, learning about its unique production process. 10:00 AM: Explore a local industry (options include a rice liquor distillery, mushroom farm, or mulberry wine production). 11:00 AM: Witness the impressive Elephant Waterfall and the windy Wind Cave. 12:00 PM: Have lunch at a local restaurant. 1:00 PM: Observe the process of silk scarf making. 2:00 PM: Visit the solemn Linh An Pagoda with its dragons and giant Buddha statues. 3:00 PM: Visit a cricket farm and have the option to try fried crickets. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat Free Day
days.details: On a free day in Da Lat, you can explore the beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture at your own pace. Visit the famous Crazy House for its unique architecture, stroll through the Da Lat Flower Gardens, and relax by Xuan Huong Lake. You can also explore the Da Lat Night Market for local cuisine and souvenirs or take a cable car ride to Truc Lam Pagoda for peaceful views. If you enjoy nature, hike to Datanla Waterfall or visit the Valley of Love for serene surroundings. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat - Fly to Da Nang - Hoi An
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. When the time comes, transportation will be provided to the airport for your flight to Da Nang. Upon landing at Danang Airport, we will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in heart of Hoi An. After checking in, the remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the ancient town. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour - Basket Boat Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Explore the Cam Thanh region with a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Visit Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site). Explore the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for an excursion to Ba Na Hills, experiencing four seasons in one day, festivals, activities, and diverse cuisine. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car, enjoying panoramic mountain views. Visit the famous Golden Bridge, supported by giant stone hands. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Head to Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park. Enjoy a buffet lunch on Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village, a replica of classical French architecture. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Free Day
days.details: Free day at your leisure. Relax on An Bang Beach, take a leisurely bike ride through the countryside, or visit a local tailor to have custom clothing made. In the evening, experience the magic of the lantern-lit town and maybe take a boat ride along the Thu Bon River. Optional watching 2 shows in Hoi An: Hoi An Memories Show is a grand outdoor performance celebrating the town's history and culture, while Teh Dar Show is an acrobatic and musical spectacle that highlights Vietnam's tribal traditions. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. When the time comes, transportation will be provided to the airport for your flight to Ha Noi. Upon landing at Noi Bai International Airport, retrieve your luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Look out for our driver, who will be holding a sign with your name on it. In case of any difficulty finding him, you're welcome to reach out to us via call or WhatsApp (+84) 888 242 848. for immediate assistance. We will provide a comfortable transfer to your hotel located in heart of Ha Noi. After checking in, the remainder of the day is yours to relax or begin exploring the vibrant city. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi Full Day City Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Tour guide picks you up for a full-day Hanoi exploration. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, Stilt House - note Mausoleum closures). See the unique One Pillar Pagoda. Visit the historically significant Temple of Literature. Enjoy local lunch at a nearby restaurant. Afternoon: Visit the Ethnology Museum (or Women's Museum if Ethnology Museum is closed). Experience the bustling Hanoi Train Street and Old Quarter, including Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. Return to your hotel around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Giang by Bus
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. Travel from Hanoi to Ha Giang by bus to explore Vietnam's stunning northern mountains and ethnic cultures. Settle into your accommodation in Ha Giang town. Get ready for Ha Giang loop adventures. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Ha Giang - Quan Ba - Yen Minh - Pho Cao - Sung La - Dong Van Town Join to Group
days.details: 8:30 AM: Breakfast. Start the Ha Giang Loop motorbike adventure with an easy rider. Check-in: KMO in Ha Giang city - Bac Sum Pass - Quan Ba Heaven Gate (stop for Quan Ba twin mountains, Tam Son Town). 12:30 PM: After Can Ty Pass, stops at scenic spots (lonely trees, Van Chai cliff), then lunch in Yen Minh town. 1:30 PM: Continue to Dong Van, visiting Tham Ma Pass, Pho Cao village, Sung La valley, Lung Cam cultural village ('Pao's house'), Tam Giac Mach field, Moon rock field (Sa Phin village). 4:30 PM: Visit the Vuong family mansion (H'Mong King), experiencing the unique architecture. 6:00 PM: Check in to hotel/homestay and rest. 7:30 PM: Dinner, then free time to explore Dong Van old town and night market. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Dong Van Town - Ma Le - China Border - Lung Cu Flag Pole - Northern Pole Point - Ma Pi Leng Pass - Meo Vac Town – Join in Group
days.details: 8:30 AM: After breakfast, depart for Lung Cu Flagpole, the northernmost point of Vietnam, and Lo Lo Chai cultural village. Visit the Northernmost point of Vietnam (3km from Lung Cu Flagpole). 1:30 PM: After lunch, visit Happiness Road, the majestic Ma Pi Leng Pass (stop at the monument, Death Rock, Sky Path, panorama view), and the beautiful Nho Que River. 3:00 PM: Take a boat trip on the Nho Que River to see the highest Tu San Canyon in Southeast Asia. 5:30 PM: Check in and overnight at Pa Vi H'mong cultural village. 7:30 PM: Dinner, free time to explore or join a homestay party. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Meo Vac Town - Du Gia Village - Join in Group
days.details: 8:30 AM: Breakfast, then continue from Meo Vac to Du Gia with scenic winding roads and valleys. Check-in stops at M pass shooting location, Mau Due, and Lung Ho. 12:30 PM: Lunch at a restaurant in Mau Due. Continue to Du Gia commune. 3:00 PM: Arrive in Du Gia commune, visit Du Gia waterfall, and walk around the village. 5:00 PM: Check in at a local homestay in Du Gia village. Enjoy dinner with Tay cuisine and corn wine ('happy water'). Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Du Gia - Duong Village - Lung Tam - Lung Khuy Cave - Quan Ba - Ha Giang City – Join in Group
days.details: 8:30 am: After breakfast, we will depart back to Ha Giang city. On the way stopping to admire and visit some beautiful scenes: the valley Duong Thuong, Visit Lung Tam weaving village. We will visit Lung Khuy cave in Quan Ba district We have lunch at Tam Son town. Quan Ba and return to Ha Giang city at around 5:00 p.m, shower, rest at Hostel, homestay. Overnight in Ha Giang.

days.title: Ha Giang - Ha Noi by Bus
days.details: Breakfast at the hotel. Return from Ha Giang to Hanoi by bus, enjoying the scenic mountain landscapes along the way. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Ha Long Bay
days.details: 08:00 – 08:30 La Regina Classic Cruise Pick up at hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15 Check-in aboard with a welcome drink from crew member while the manager introduces the safety briefing and the boat cruises to the Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15 Let your vacation start with a delicious lunch in the restaurant. 15:30 Discover Thien Canh Son cave located on top of mountain, containing the long history of geological value and natural beauty. Recommend you bring camera and wear sport shoes for hiking. 17:30 Enjoy your time with the beautiful sunset on the bay and join 'Happy Hour'. 18:00 Cooking class on sundeck with the Deep Fried Spring rolls, one of the unique flavor of Vietnamese food. 19:30 Dinner will be served on sundeck or restaurant. 21:00 Feel free to relax on boat, join Squid fishing at the area of Reception deck. Overnight in Ha Long Bay.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi
days.details: 06:30 Start your day with the Taichi on sundeck. 07:00 Light breakfast serve in dining room. 07:45 Visiting Vung Vieng floating fishing village, one of the biggest villages in HaLong Bay, you will have the chance to learn about fishermen's living and feel free with some option activities: bamboo boat or kayaking. 09:00 Back to the main boat for relaxing and check out at the reception, please put all your luggage at the outside of your cabin door, crew member will help to bring luggage on land. 09:45 Brunch is served in the restaurant while the boat heads back to the harbor. 11:00 Disembark at the harbor. Transfer to Ha Noi city. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi Departure
days.details: Breakfast at your Hotel. You have free time until your driver arrives to pick you up from your hotel to take you to the airport for your onward flight. End of trip.

24.name: Private Vietnam 24 Days 23 Nights - Highlands to Islands Expedition (Detailed)

days.title: Ha Noi Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Noi Bai International Airport. Retrieve luggage and proceed to the arrival gate. Meet the guide or driver holding a sign with your name. Enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Hanoi. Overnight in Hanoi.

days.title: Hanoi City Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM: Tour guide picks you up for a full day exploring Hanoi. Visit the Ho Chi Minh Complex (dress modestly: shoulders to knees), including the Mausoleum (closed Mondays, Fridays, and June 15th to August 15th - exterior viewing possible), Presidential Palace, and Stilt House. See the unique One Pillar Pagoda nestled in tranquil gardens. Explore the Temple of Literature, known for its well-preserved architecture and historical significance. Enjoy a local lunch at a nearby restaurant. Experience the bustling Hanoi Train Street and the Old Quarter, including the serene Ngoc Son Temple on Hoan Kiem Lake. (Alternative: Women's Museum if Monday or Ethnology Museum is closed). Return to your hotel around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Hoa Lu – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Guide and driver pick you up for a trip to Ninh Binh. Visit Hoa Lu, the ancient capital. Explore the historic Dinh and Le Temples, dedicated to Emperor Dinh Tien Hoang and Emperor Le Dai Hanh. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Experience a mesmerizing boat ride through the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex, surrounded by limestone karsts and lush greenery, exploring caves and grottoes. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave) and climb nearly 500 steps to the top of Lying Dragon Mountain for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Ha Giang – Quan Ba - Yen Minh
days.details: 06:30: Limousine bus pick-up from your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 11:00: Bus stops for a break in Tuyen Quang City. 13:00: Arrive in Ha Giang City and have lunch at the restaurant. Begin the Ha Giang Loop journey: KmO Milestone, Heaven's Gate, Quan Ba Twin Mountain, Can Ty Pass. 17:00: Arrive in Yen Minh town, check into the hotel, and relax. 18:30: Enjoy a group dinner at the restaurant, followed by free time. Overnight in Yen Minh.

days.title: Yen Minh - Lung Cu - Dong Van - Meo Vac
days.details: 07:00: Breakfast and hotel check-out. Continue the journey with visits to: Tham Ma Pass, Lung Cam Cultural Village (visit Pao's House), King's Palace, Lung Cu Flag Tower, Lo Lo Chai Village. 12:30: Arrive in Dong Van Old Town for rest and lunch at a local restaurant. Explore Dong Van Old Town or relax. Continue the journey with a visit to: Ma Pi Leng Pass, Panorama stop for breathtaking views, Nho Que River by boat. 17:00: Arrive in Meo Vac town for check-in and dinner at a Pa Vi Cultural village homestay. 18:30: Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant, followed by free time to rest and relax. Overnight in Meo Vac.

days.title: Meo Vac – 14-Floor Pass – Pac Po – Cao Bang
days.details: 07:00: Breakfast and check out of the homestay. Continue the tour visiting: Meo Vac Town (Sunday mornings: optional Ethnic Market), Bao Lac Town, 14-Floor Pass (Me Pia Pass). 12:30: Enjoy lunch at a restaurant. Visit the historical site of Pac Po in Ha Quang District, Cao Bang Province, including: Le Nin Spring, Karl Marx Mountain, Coc Po Cave. 17:00: Arrive in Cao Bang City and check in at a homestay. 18:30: Enjoy dinner at the restaurant. Free time to explore Cao Bang at night (weekends: optional visit to Kim Dong Pedestrian Street). Overnight in Cao Bang.

days.title: Cao Bang – Ban Gioc Waterfall
days.details: 7:00: After breakfast, depart to visit Ban Gioc Waterfall, with stops at scenic viewpoints along the way. Visit Ban Gioc Waterfall. Take a boat to explore Ban Gioc Waterfall. Visit Phat Tich Pagoda. 12:30: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Continue the journey to visit Nguom Ngao Cave. 16:00: Check into accommodation in Ban Gioc and enjoy leisure time. 18:30: Dinner at the restaurant. Evening: Relax at your own pace (optional interaction with the local community). Overnight in Ban Gioc.

days.title: Ban Gioc - Ba Be Lake
days.details: 7:00: Breakfast and check out. Visit: Thung Lung Nui Thung (Eye of God Mountain Valley), Ren Phuc Sen Village (knife-making and agricultural tools). 10:00: Depart from Cao Bang for Ba Be Lake, enjoying scenic mountain passes (Tai Ho Sin, Cao Bac, Khau Khang, Gio Pass). 12:00: Lunch break at Gio Pass. 16:00: Arrive at Ba Be and check into a traditional stilt house with the Tay ethnic people by Ba Be Lake. 18:30: Dinner and overnight stay in the Ba Be tourist area. Overnight in Ba Be.

days.title: Ba Be Lake - Ha Noi
days.details: 7:00: Breakfast and check out. 8:00: Enjoy a boat trip on Ba Be Lake, visiting: Fairy Pond, An Ma Temple, Ba Goa Island. 11:30: Have lunch at a local restaurant. Begin the journey back to Hanoi with stops at souvenir shops in Bac Kan and Thai Nguyen. 19:00: Arrive in Hanoi. Tour ends at Noi Bai Airport or in Hanoi Old Quarter (guest's choice). Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi - Ha Long Bay
days.details: 08:00 – 08:30: Hotel pick-up in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15: Check in aboard with a welcome drink and safety briefing as the boat cruises to Bai Tu Long Bay. 13:15: Enjoy lunch in the restaurant. 15:30: Explore Thien Canh Son cave (hiking involved, sports shoes recommended). 17:30: Enjoy sunset on the bay and 'Happy Hour'. 18:00: Cooking class on the sundeck (Deep Fried Spring rolls). 19:30: Dinner served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 21:00: Relax on the boat or join Squid fishing (Reception deck area). Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Ha Long Bay - Ha Noi - Fly to Hue
days.details: 06:30: Start the day with Taichi on the sundeck. 07:00: Light breakfast served in the dining room. 07:45: Visit Vung Vieng floating fishing village (optional bamboo boat or kayaking). 09:00: Return to the main boat for relaxing and check out (place luggage outside cabin door). 09:45: Brunch is served in the restaurant as the boat returns to the harbor. 11:00: Disembark at the harbor. Shuttle bus stops at AEON Mall Long Bien. Hotel pick-up for transfer to Noi Bai Airport. Take a 1-hour flight to Hue. Upon arrival in Hue, a vehicle will transfer you to your hotel for check-in. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue City Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Guide pick-up for a full-day exploration of Hue's historical sites. Visit the Ancient Citadel, exploring grand gates and palatial structures to learn about Vietnam's royal history. Enjoy a serene boat ride to Thien Mu Pagoda, offering spiritual insights and Perfume River views. Lunch in a restaurant in the city center. Explore Tu Duc Tomb in the afternoon, a masterpiece of Vietnamese architecture. Conclude the day with a visit to Dong Ba Market, experiencing local crafts and cuisine. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue - Hai Van Pass - Marble Mountain - Hoi An by Private Car
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Depart with a tour guide and car towards Hai Van Pass for scenic views and photo opportunities. Explore the Marble Mountains, visiting caves and ancient pagodas, and enjoying the views. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Conclude the travel with a drive to Hoi An and check into your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Walking Tour & Basket Boat Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Start your exploration of the Cam Thanh region with a peaceful bamboo boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Move to Hoi An Ancient Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. Visit the Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a day trip to Ba Na Hills. Experience four seasons in a day, festivals, activities, and diverse cuisines. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car (5,801 meters) with panoramic mountain views. Visit the Golden Bridge, supported by two giant stone hands. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park. Have a buffet lunch at a restaurant on Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village, a replica of classical and romantic French architecture. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An - Da Nang - Fly to Ho Chi Minh
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Transfer to Da Nang International Airport for your flight to Ho Chi Minh City. Upon arrival at Tan Son Nhat International Airport, meet your driver for transfer to your hotel in Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh City Full Day
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Meet your guide and car at your hotel to explore Ho Chi Minh City. Visit the Reunification Palace. Walk to see French colonial structures: Notre Dame Cathedral and the Old Central Post Office. Continue to Chinatown and Thien Hau Pagoda. Explore Binh Tay market. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Visit the War Remnants Museum. End the city tour at Ben Thanh market. Transfer back to your hotel. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Mekong Delta Full Day Tour
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Depart for My Tho on the Mekong River. Visit Vinh Trang Pagoda. Take a sampan cruise around Dragon, Unicorn, Phoenix, and Tortoise islands. Stop at Unicorn Island, walk through orchards, enjoy tropical fruits and folk music, and visit a fruit plantation. Ride a hand-rowed sampan through Thoi Son canal, visit a family business, a honey-bee farm (enjoy honey tea), and a coconut candy workshop. Have lunch at a local restaurant. Afternoon: Cycle around Tan Thach village to experience local life (hammock relaxation available). Return to Ho Chi Minh City. End of trip. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh - Fly to Phu Quoc
days.details: Have breakfast at your hotel. Meet your driver and guide for transfer to Tan Son Nhat International Airport. Take a 1-hour flight to Phu Quoc. Upon arrival in Phu Quoc, a vehicle will transfer you to your hotel for check-in. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Sightseeing South & North Together Full Day
days.details: 09:00: Hotel pick-up from the lobby in central Duong Dong town (surcharge may apply for other areas). VISIT SOUTH: Pearl Farm: Pearl harvesting. Sim Wine factory: Local wine production. Pepper Farm: Local garden. Ham Ninh: Visit the fishing village. Ho Quoc Pagoda: Scenic uphill ride. Bai Sao Beach: Relax, swim, sunbathe (lunch included if booked). Coconut Prison: History of war. Fish Sauce Factory. Tranh Stream Waterfall: Light trekking (no stop May-Oct). Visit Sun Premier Village Primavera: Bell Tower - Kiss Bridge. Lunch options: Sao Beach, Rach Vem, or Dai Beach. VISIT NORTH: Bee Farm. National Park: Light forest walk. Rach Vem Village: Starfish Beach - Swimming. Ganh Dau Cape (Cambodia viewpoint). 17:00: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: 3 Islands Trip - Xuong Island - Gam Ghi Island - May Rut Trong Island by Speed Boat
days.details: 08:30: Hotel pick-up from the lobby or designated point in central Duong Dong town (surcharge may apply for other areas). Arrive at An Thoi harbor and board a speedboat. Visit 3 islands in the south: Gam Ghi Island: Snorkeling at the coral reef - Enjoy the beach. Xuong Island: Snorkeling at the coral reef. May Rut Trong Island: Lunch on the island, island exploring, white sand lagoon. Optional: Seawalker near Hon Thom island (at your own expense). 17:00: Return to your hotel. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc Free & Relax
days.details: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast at the hotel. Spend the day at your own pace, relaxing or exploring Phu Quoc Island ('Pearl Island'). Recommendations and assistance for activities available from travel experts. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc Free & Relax
days.details: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast at the hotel. Spend the day at your own pace, relaxing or exploring Phu Quoc Island ('Pearl Island'). Recommendations and assistance for activities available from travel experts. Overnight in Phu Quoc.

days.title: Phu Quoc - Fly to HCM for Departure
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time until your driver arrives. Transfer to Phu Quoc International Airport for your departure.

30.name: Private Vietnam 30 Days 29 Nights – Vietnam Full Month (Detailed)

days.title: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Arrival
days.details: Arrive at Tan Son Nhat International Airport. Luggage retrieval and proceed to arrival gate. Meet guide/driver holding a sign with your name. Comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Ho Chi Minh City. Free time for relaxation or initial exploration. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Ho Chi Minh – Cai Be – Floating Market – An Binh Island – Vinh Long – Can Tho
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by driver and guide for transfer to Cai Be tourist wharf. Boat trip along Cai Be River to visit the Cai Be floating market. Explore local traditional craft villages: rice paper, candy, green rice, longan drying. Short walk to enjoy honey tea at a fruit garden, learn about beekeeping. Boat trip upstream the Tien River to Tan Phong Islet. Rowboat through small canals (approx. 20 mins) and walk in a fruit garden (approx. 10 mins), enjoy fresh fruits. Lunch at a local restaurant (garden house). Disembark at Vinh Long Wharf after the tour. Admire My Thuan Suspension Bridge on the way back. Transfer to Can Tho for overnight stay. Overnight in Can Tho.

days.title: Can Tho – Cai Rang Floating Market – Ho Chi Minh
days.details: Visit the Cai Rang floating market, the largest in the Mekong Delta, experiencing the vibrant trade and river culture. Observe the bustling exchange of fruits and goods from boats. Opportunity to taste local specialties like fresh fruits and noodle dishes. Authentic insight into the daily life and traditions of southern Vietnam. Local lunch at a local restaurant. Transfer back to Ho Chi Minh City. Overnight in Ho Chi Minh.

days.title: Saigon – Fly to Nha Trang
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Private car transfer to Tan Son Nhat Airport for your flight to Nha Trang. Arrive at Cam Ranh International Airport, retrieve luggage, and proceed to arrival gate. Meet driver holding a sign with your name. Comfortable transfer to your hotel in central Nha Trang city. Free time for relaxation or initial exploration of Nha Trang. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang Full Day City & Mud Spa Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 8:30 AM: Pick-up by driver and guide to start the tour. Visit the Vietnam Oceanographic Institute. Explore Long Son Pagoda, the Cathedral (Stone Church), and Chong Promontory Rocks. Lunch during the tour. Visit the Cham Po Nagar Temples. Relax and enjoy mud bathing in private tubs and mineral springs swimming at Thap Ba Hot Spring Mud Center. Return to your hotel, observing local Nha Trang life along the way. Tour ends around 5:00 PM. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang Free Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to relax and explore Nha Trang at your own pace. Overnight in Nha Trang.

days.title: Nha Trang – Da Lat by Private Car
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Free time until 10:00 AM. Pick-up at 10:00 AM for a private car transfer to Da Lat. Enjoy the scenic drive to Da Lat, known for its cool climate and landscapes. Arrive in Da Lat, check in to your hotel, and have free time. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat City Tour
days.details: 8:00 AM: Visit Bao Dai Summer Palace, the former residence of Vietnam's last Emperor. Explore Robin Hill and take a cable car ride for panoramic views of Da Lat and Paradise Lake. Visit Truc Lam Zen Monastery, the largest Zen university in Vietnam, with its beautiful flower garden. Experience Datanla Waterfall, with options for a roller coaster ride or a walk to the bottom. See Van Hanh Pagoda and its giant golden Sakyamuni Buddha statue. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. In the afternoon, visit Da Lat Cathedral Church with its European Gothic architecture. Explore the Flower Park, known as a paradise of local and foreign flowers. Optional activities in the Flower Park: photography, bonsai park walk, lakeside stroll, horse riding, swan pedal boat. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat Free Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a free day to relax and explore the romantic city of Da Lat at your own pace. Overnight in Da Lat.

days.title: Da Lat – Fly to Da Nang – Hoi An
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. Private car transfer to Da Lat Airport for your flight to Da Nang. Upon arrival at Da Nang International Airport, meet your driver. Transfer to your hotel in Hoi An. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Walking Tour Full Day – Tra Que – Basket Boat
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up to begin exploring Hoi An Ancient Town (UNESCO World Heritage site). Visit the historic Tan Ky Old House. Discover the Fukien Assembly Hall. See the iconic Japanese Covered Bridge. Stroll through the vibrant Hoi An Market. Continue to Tra Que Vegetable Village for a delightful lunch featuring fresh, organic produce. Explore Tra Que Village, observing daily life and traditional farming practices. Transfer to the Cam Thanh region for a peaceful bamboo basket boat trip through the Coconut Palm Forest. Return to your hotel, with the rest of the day free for relaxation or further exploration. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Ba Na Hills Full Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up for a day trip to Ba Na Hills. Experience four seasons in one day and enjoy various festivals, activities, and cuisines. Ascend via the world's longest non-stop single-track cable car (5,801 meters) with panoramic mountain views. Visit the famous Golden Bridge, supported by two giant stone hands. Explore Le Jardin D'Amour (nine themed gardens) and Linh Ung Pagoda. Enjoy Fantasy Park, a large indoor amusement park. Have a buffet lunch at a restaurant in Ba Na Hills. Explore the French Village, a replica of classical and romantic French architecture. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – My Son Half Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by car and tour guide for a half-day trip to My Son Sanctuary. Discover the ancient Hindu temples of the Champa Kingdom in a beautiful countryside setting. Enjoy an enchanting Cham dance performance. Return to your hotel around 12:00 PM. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An Free Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy your free time relaxing on the beach and exploring the ancient city of Hoi An. Overnight in Hoi An.

days.title: Hoi An – Marble Mountain – Hue
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by car and tour guide for a scenic drive to Hue. Visit the impressive Marble Mountain. Take in the breathtaking views from Hai Van Pass. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Continue to Hue and check in to your hotel. Free time to unwind or explore Hue after hotel drop-off. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue City Tour Full Day
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Hotel pickup by a guide for a full-day tour of Hue's historical sites. Visit Minh Mang Tomb with its beautiful gardens and ponds, showcasing harmonious imperial designs. Enjoy a peaceful boat ride to Thien Mu Pagoda for spiritual insights and Perfume River views. Lunch at a restaurant in the city center. Afternoon exploration of Tu Duc Tomb, a masterpiece of Vietnamese architecture. End the day with a visit to Dong Ba Market for local crafts and cuisine. Return to your hotel. Overnight in Hue.

days.title: Hue – Fly to Ha Noi
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Private car transfer to Hue Airport for your flight to Hanoi. Upon arrival at Noi Bai International Airport, meet your driver. Transfer to your hotel in Hanoi for check-in. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi City Afternoon Tour by Jeep
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel and a free morning. Afternoon Tour (12:30 PM - 5:00 PM): 12:30 PM: Pick-up by Jeep and tour guide from your hotel. Explore the hidden backstreets, bustling markets, and vibrant street life of Hanoi by Jeep. Discover historical highlights including the French Colonial Quarter, Old Quarter, Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum area, West Lake, and Tran Quoc Temple. Enjoy views of the Red River from Long Bien Bridge and experience the famous Hanoi Train Street. Savor authentic Vietnamese cuisine and local specialties like egg coffee during the tour. After the tour, return to your hotel. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Bai Dinh – Trang An – Mua Cave Full Day Tour
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by car for a journey to Ninh Binh. Visit Bai Dinh Pagoda, the largest Buddhist complex in Vietnam. Enjoy lunch at a restaurant. Explore the UNESCO-listed Trang An Scenic Landscape Complex with a mesmerizing boat ride through limestone karsts and caves. Visit Mua Cave (Dancing Cave) and climb almost 500 steps for panoramic views of Tam Coc. Transfer back to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Hanoi – Visit to Quang Phu Cau Incense Village
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM: Pick-up by guide and driver for a trip to Quang Phu Cau incense-making village. Visit a local workshop to learn about the incense-making process and observe artisans at work. Explore the village and visit various workshops, interacting with artisans. Participate in a short incense-making workshop to create your own souvenir. Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. Return to your hotel in Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Sa Pa by Limousine Bus
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Pick-up from your hotel by limousine bus for Sapa (pickup time to be advised). Relaxing 5-6 hour drive to Sapa. Upon arrival in Sapa, transfer to your hotel. Free time to explore Sapa town at your own pace. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Cat Cat – Y Linh Ho – Lao Chai – Tavan
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM: Meet your local guide and driver at your hotel in Sapa for a short transfer to Cat Cat village. Trek downhill to Cat Cat village, stopping at a waterfall and hydroelectric station. Continue trekking on a dirt trail through rice paddy terraces, enjoying scenic views along a narrow river. Arrive in Y Linh Ho village (Black Hmong minority) for a rest and lunch near the river (approx. 1 hour). After lunch, trek through Muong Hoa valley, passing Lao Chai village (Black Hmong) and Tavan village (Giay minority). Return to Sapa from Tavan by car (approx. 0.5-hour drive). Approximate activity duration: 5 hours walking. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Sapa – O Quy Ho – Silver Waterfall – Love Waterfall – Heaven Gate Half Day
days.details: 8:00 AM: Meet your guide and driver for a scenic trip. Drive approx. 30 minutes through Hoang Lien National Park and O Quy Ho Pass to Silver Waterfall. Explore Silver Waterfall via walkways and ladders (best visited May-October). Continue to Love Waterfall, a popular spot with cascading waterfalls. Optional stop at a local orchard to see cool climate fruits and chat with a farmer. Travel to Heaven's Gate (2047m) for panoramic views of the valleys and, on a clear day, Mount Fansipan. End the tour at your hotel. Dinner at your own leisure. Overnight in Sapa. Approximate activity duration: 1.5 hours driving / 2 hours walking. Overnight in Sa Pa.

days.title: Fansipan Half Day – Ha Noi by Limousine Bus
days.details: Enjoy an early breakfast at your hotel and check out (leave luggage at the hotel). 8:00 AM: Hotel pick-up by your guide for the Fansipan excursion. Arrive at Fansipan Mountain and board the cable car to the summit. Enjoy panoramic views from the 'Roof of Indochina.' Explore temples and statues at the summit. Return to the base, where your driver will take you back to the hotel to collect your luggage. 2:00 PM: Pick-up by limousine bus for your transfer back to Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi Free Day
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy a full free day in Hanoi to relax, explore at your own pace, or do some souvenir shopping. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Mai Chau
days.details: Enjoy breakfast at your hotel. 8:30 AM: Depart from Hanoi to Mai Chau valley. 12:00 PM: Arrive in Mai Chau and enjoy lunch. 2:00 PM: Check in to your room at Mai Chau Ecolodge (early check-in if available). 3:00 PM: Biking tour with a local guide to explore the ethnic villages of Na Thia, Chieng Sai, Cha Long, Tong Dau, and Van. Interact with friendly locals and discover their traditional culture. Total cycling time: approx. 2 - 2.5 hours on flat village paths. 6:30 PM: Return to Mai Chau Ecolodge for dinner. 8:30 PM: Enjoy a traditional dance show and taste Ruou Can (local rice wine). Overnight at Mai Chau Ecolodge. Overnight in Mai Chau.

days.title: Mai Chau – Ha Noi
days.details: 6:30 AM - 7:30 AM: Breakfast at Mai Chau Ecolodge. 8:00 AM (Recommended): Free time to explore Mai Chau's ethnic villages (Na Thia, Nhot, Pom Coong, Lac, Chieng Chau) by walking. Interact with friendly locals and discover their traditional culture. Total walking time: approx. 2.5 - 3 hours on flat village paths. Check out from the Ecolodge around 12:00 PM. 12:00 PM - 1:15 PM: Lunch at the Ecolodge's restaurant. 1:30 PM: Transfer back to Hanoi. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Ha Noi – Ha Long Bay
days.details: Have breakfast at the hotel. 8:00 AM - 8:30 AM: La Regina Classic Cruise pick-up at your hotel in Hanoi Old Quarter. 12:15 PM: Check-in aboard the cruise with a welcome drink and safety briefing as the boat cruises to Bai Tu Long Bay. 1:15 PM: Enjoy lunch in the restaurant. 3:30 PM: Explore Thien Canh Son cave (hiking recommended, bring camera and wear sports shoes). 5:30 PM: Enjoy sunset on the bay and join 'Happy Hour.' 6:00 PM: Cooking class on the sundeck (Deep Fried Spring rolls). 7:30 PM: Dinner served on the sundeck or in the restaurant. 9:00 PM: Relax on the boat or join squid fishing at the Reception deck area. Overnight on La Regina Classic Cruise in Ha Long Bay. Overnight in Ha Long.

days.title: Ha Long Bay – Ha Noi
days.details: 6:30 AM: Start your day with Taichi on the sundeck. 7:00 AM: Light breakfast served in the dining room. 7:45 AM: Visit Vung Vieng floating fishing village. Options for bamboo boat or kayaking to learn about fishermen's lives. 9:00 AM: Return to the main boat for relaxation and check-out. Please leave luggage outside your cabin door. 9:45 AM: Brunch is served in the restaurant as the boat returns to the harbor. 11:00 AM: Disembark at the harbor. Transfer back to Hanoi city. Overnight in Ha Noi.

days.title: Departure from Hanoi
days.details: Breakfast at your hotel. Enjoy free time until your driver arrives for your transfer to the airport for your onward flight.
